{c_important}Rallying Cry{/c} grants you {c_important}{u}Unstoppable{/u}{/c} while active.
{c_important}War Cry{/c} grants you {c_important}{u}Berserking{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_10}{/c} seconds.
Ripping your weapon out of enemies during {c_important}Rupture{/c} causes an explosion that deals {c_number}{dot:EXPLOSION_BLEEDING}{/c} Bleeding damage over {c_number}{SF_19}{/c} seconds.
If {c_important}Leap{/c} doesn't damage any enemies, its Cooldown is reduced by {c_number}{SF_12}{/c} seconds.
Enemies who are Knocked Back into terrain by {c_important}Charge{/c} take {c_number}{payload:TOOLTIP_IMPACT_WALL}{/c} damage and are Stunned for {c_number}{SF_11}{/c} seconds.
{c_important}Death Blow{/c} deals {c_number}[{SF_12} * 100|%x|]{/c} increased damage to Bosses.
{c_important}Steel Grasp{/c} also makes enemies {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[{SF_6}|1|]{/c} seconds.
Heal for {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life {c_number}([Max(1,PlayerHealthMax() * SF_0)]){/c} for each {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} Fury spent.
Damaging enemies with {c_important}Kick{/c} makes them {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_17}{/c} seconds.
Increase the Damage Reduction gained while you are {c_important}{u}Fortified{/u}{/c} by an additional {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c}.
While {c_important}{u}Berserking{/u}{/c}, Fury Generation is increased by {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%x|]{/c}.
While using a Slashing weapon, {c_important}Whirlwind{/c} also inflicts {c_number}[SF_16 * 100|%|]{/c} of its Base damage as Bleeding damage over {c_number}{SF_15}{/c} seconds.
After using {c_important}Whirlwind{/c} for {c_number}{SF_14}{/c} seconds, {c_important}Whirlwind{/c} deals {c_number}[{SF_13}* 100|%x|]{/c} increased damage until it is cancelled.
If at least {c_number}{SF_12}{/c} enemies are Nearby when you cast {c_important}War Cry{/c}, your damage bonus is increased to {c_number}[({SF_1} + {SF_9}) *100|%x|]{/c}.
{c_important}War Cry{/c} grants you {c_number}[{SF_15}*100|%|]{/c} Base Life {c_number}([{fortified:MOD_FORTIFY_BASE}|0|]){/c} as {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c}.

Dealing direct damage to an enemy with a Skill that is not {c_important}Upheaval{/c} causes your next cast of {c_important}Upheaval{/c} to deal {c_number}[{SF_12}  * 100|%x|]{/c} increased damage, stacking up to {c_number}{SF_13}{/c} times.

If {c_important}Upheaval{/c} damages at least {c_number}[{SF_18}]{/c} enemies, you gain {c_important}{u}Berserking{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_9}{/c} seconds, increased to {c_number}{SF_11}{/c} seconds if it damages at least {c_number}{SF_10}{/c} enemies.
Hitting at least {c_number}1{/c} enemy with {c_important}Rupture{/c} Heals you for {c_number}[{SF_21}*100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life {c_number}([PlayerHealthMax() * SF_21]){/c}.
Hitting enemies with {c_important}Rupture{/c} increases your Attack Speed by {c_number}[{SF_23} * 100|%+|]{/c} for {c_number}{buffduration:ATTACK_SPEED}{/c} seconds.
{c_important}Rend{/c} deals {c_number}[{SF_9}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage to {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} enemies.
Direct damage with {c_important}Rend{/c} grants {c_number}{SF_8}{/c} Fury per enemy hit, up to a maximum of {c_number}{SF_7}{/c} Fury.
{c_important}Rallying Cry{/c} generates {c_number}{SF_13}{/c} Fury and grants you an additional {c_number}[{SF_8} * 100|%x|]{/c} Resource Generation.

{c_important}Rallying Cry{/c} grants you {c_number}[{SF_14}*100|%|]{/c} Base Life {c_number}([Max(1,{fortified:MOD_FORTIFY_BASE})|0|]){/c} as {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c}.While Rallying Cry is active, you gain an additional {c_number}[{SF_15}*100|%|]{/c} Base Life {c_number}([Max(1,{fortified:MOD_FORTIFY_PERHIT})|0|]){/c} as {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c} each time you take or deal direct damage.
If {c_important}Steel Grasp{/c} damages an enemy, gain {c_important}{u}Berserking{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_7}{/c} seconds.
{c_important}Steel Grasp{/c} gains {c_number}{SF_10}{/c} additional Charge.
If {c_important}Leap{/c} damages at least one enemy, gain {c_number}{SF_11}{/c} Fury.
Enemies damaged by {c_important}Leap{/c} are Slowed by {c_number}[{SF_16}*100|%|]{/c} for {c_number}{buffduration:UPGRADEB_SLOW}{/c} seconds.
Reduce the Cooldown of your {c_important}Ultimate{/c} Skill by {c_number}{SF_12}{/c} second for each enemy damaged by {c_important}Ground Stomp{/c}.
{c_important}Ground Stomp{/c} generates {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} Fury.

After {c_important}{u}Overpowering{/u}{/c} with {c_important}Hammer of the Ancients{/c}, you deal {c_number}[{SF_18} * 100|%x|]{/c} more damage for {c_number}{buffduration:UPGRADE_BONUS_DAMAGE}{/c} seconds.
{c_important}Hammer of the Ancients{/c} deals {c_number}[{SF_12} * 100|%x|]{/c} additional damage for each point of Fury you had when using it.
Lunging Strike also inflicts {c_number}{dot:BLEEDING}{/c} Bleeding damage over {c_number}{buffduration:BLEEDING}{/c} seconds.
Critical Strikes with {c_important}Lunging Strike{/c} grant you {c_important}{u}Berserking{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[{SF_9}|1|]{/c} seconds.

If {c_important}Kick{/c} damages an enemy, it consumes all of your Fury and deals an additional {c_number}{payload:UPGRADEA_TOOLTIP}{/c} damage per {c_number}{SF_22}{/c} Fury spent. {c_important}Kick{/c} no longer Knocks Back enemies.

{c_important}Kicked{/c} enemies deal {c_number}{payload:TOOLTIP_IMPACT_MOD}{/c} damage to enemies they collide with while being Knocked Back. Enemies damaged this way are Knocked Down for {c_number}{SF_5}{/c} seconds.
While {c_important}Iron Skin{/c} is active, Heal for {c_number}[{SF_7} * 100|%|]{/c} of the {c_important}{u}Barrier's{/u}{/c} original amount as Life per second.

{c_important}Iron Skin{/c} also grants {c_number}[{SF_8}*100|%|]{/c} Base Life {c_number}([{fortified:PAYLOAD_FORTIFY_BASE}|0|]){/c} as {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c}.Double this amount if cast while below {c_number}[{SF_9}*100|%|]{/c} Life.
While {c_important}{u}Berserking{/u}{/c}, your other Skills gain {c_number}[{SF_13}*100}|%+|]{/c} Attack Speed for each stack of Frenzy you have.
You gain {c_number}[{SF_15}*100|%|]{/c} Damage Reduction for each stack of {c_important}Frenzy{/c} you currently have.
Hitting an enemy with both hits of {c_important}Double Swing{/c} makes them {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[{SF_6}]{/c} second.
Casting {c_important}Double Swing{/c} while {c_important}{u}Berserking{/u}{/c} grants {c_number}{SF_9}{/c} additional seconds of {c_important}{u}Berserking{/u}{/c}.
Reduce {c_important}Charge's{/c} Cooldown by {c_number}{SF_13}{/c} seconds if it Knocks Back an enemy into terrain.
Damaging enemies with {c_important}Charge{/c} makes them {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[SF_18]{/c} seconds.

When {c_important}Flay{/c} deals direct damage to an enemy, they take {c_number}[{SF_10}*100|%x|]{/c} increased Bleeding damage from you for the next {c_number}{buffduration:AMPLIFY_BLEED_DEBUFF}{/c} seconds.

When {c_important}Flay{/c} deals direct damage to an enemy, you gain {c_number}[{SF_19} * 100]%{/c} Damage Reduction and {c_number}[{SF_21}]{/c} Thorns for {c_number}[{SF_17}]{/c} seconds. This stacks up to {c_number}[{SF_12}]{/c} times.
If {c_important}Death Blow{/c} damages at least one enemy, gain {c_number}{SF_15}{/c} Fury.
If {c_important}Death Blow{/c} damages at least one enemy, gain {c_important}{u}Berserking{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_16}{/c} seconds.
While {c_important}Challenging Shout{/c} is active, you gain {c_number}{SF_4}{/c} Fury each time you take damage.
While {c_important}Challenging Shout{/c} is active, gain Thorns equal to {c_number}[{SF_12} * 100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life.

After {c_important}Critically Striking{/c} {c_number}[{SF_13}]{/c} times with {c_important}Bash{/c} using a Two-Handed weapon, your next {c_Important}Core{/c} or {c_important}Weapon Mastery{/c} Skill will {c_important}{u}Overpower{/u}{/c}.
Damaging a Stunned enemy with {c_important}Bash{/c} generates an additional {c_number}[SF_4]{/c} Fury, or {c_number}[{SF_4} + {SF_8}]{/c} Fury if using a Two-Handed weapon.
While using Two-Handed weapons you deal {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Damage.
{c_important}Core{/c} Skills deal {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage, but cost {c_number}[{SF_0}*-1*100|%x|]{/c} more Fury.

Increase your Thorns by {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%+|]{/c}. When enemies hit you, they take an additional {c_number}[{SF_3} * 100]%{/c} of your Thorns as Bleeding damage over {c_number}{buffduration:BLEEDING}{/c} seconds.

Dealing direct damage with a Two-Handed Bludgeoning, Two-Handed Slashing, or Dual Wielded weapons grants {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage for {c_number}{buffduration:BUFF_BLUNT_DAMAGE}{/c} seconds.

While all three damage bonuses are active, you gain an additional {c_number}[{SF_7}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage.
Attack Speed is increased by {c_number}[{Script Formula 0}*100|%+|]{/c} while using One-Handed weapons.
Gain {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c} additional Maximum Life.
{c_important}Basic{/c} Skills generate {c_number}[{Script Formula 0}*100|%x|]{/c} more Fury when using Two-Handed weapons.

Dealing direct damage with a {c_important}Weapon Mastery{/c} skill causes your next {c_important}Core{/c} Skill to make enemies {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[{SF_0}]{/c} |4second:seconds;.
Your {c_important}Shout{/c} Skills cause enemies to deal {c_number}[{SF_2} * 100|%|]{/c} less damage for {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds.
Increase your Maximum Fury by {c_number}{SF_0}{/c}.
Your {c_important}{u}Overpowers{/u}{/c} deal {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage when using a Two-Handed weapon.
Your {c_important}Shout{/c} Skill effect durations are increased by {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c}.
Your Skills using Bludgeoning weapons deal {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage if the enemy is Stunned or {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c}.
Your {c_important}Shouts{/c} also Heal allies for {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} of their Maximum Life per second.
Damage Reduction against Elites is increased by {c_number}[({SF_0}*sLevel)*100|%|]{/c}.
Increase {c_important}{u}Berserk's{/u}{/c} maximum duration by {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} seconds and increase its damage bonus by {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%+|]{/c}.

When causing an enemy to Bleed, you have a chance equal to your Critical Strike Chance to increase the Bleed amount by {c_number}[{SF_8} * 100]%{/c} of your Critical Strike Damage bonus.

{c_important}{u}Overpowering{/u}{/c} a Bleeding enemy creates an explosion that inflicts {c_number}{dot:BLEEDING}{/c} Bleeding damage over {c_number}{SF_3}{/c} seconds.
You have {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%+|]{/c} increased Critical Strike chance against Immobilized, Stunned, or Slowed enemies.
When a {c_important}Brawling{/c} Skill damages at least one enemy, gain {c_important}{u}Berserking{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} |4second.:seconds.
Your Bleeding effects deal {c_number}[{SF_0} *100|%x|]{/c} increased damage to {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} enemies.
Each time you swap weapons, gain {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} Fury.
You deal {c_number}[{SF_3} * 100|%x|]{/c} increased damage to Close enemies and gain {c_number}[{SF_1} * 100|%|]{/c} Distant Damage Reduction.
Your Bleeding effects Slow enemies by {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c}.
Each time you take direct damage gain {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|1%|]{/c} Base Life {c_number}([Max(1,{fortified:FORTIFY})|0|]){/c} as {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c}.
Gain {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} Thorns. Also gain {c_number}{SF_4}{/c} Thorns for each {c_number}{SF_5}{/c} bonus Maximum Life you have.
Movement Speed is increased by {c_number}[{Script Formula 0}*sLevel*100|%+|]{/c}.

{c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Skills using Bludgeoning weapons have up to a {c_number}{SF_0}%{/c} chance to Stun enemies for {c_number}{buffduration:STUN}{/c} seconds, or up to a {c_number}{SF_1}%{/c} chance when using a Two-Handed Bludgeoning weapon.
You deal {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage against {c_important}{u}Injured{/u}{/c} enemies.
Dealing direct damage to an enemy after swapping weapons reduces {c_important}Iron Maelstrom's{/c} Cooldown by {c_number}{SF_12}{/c} second.

Each of the Ancients gains additional power:
{c_label}Korlic:{/c} You gain {c_number}10{/c} Fury each time Korlic damages an enemy with his {c_important}Frenzy{/c}.
{c_label}Talic:{/c} Enemies are Slowed by {c_number}[{SF_16}*100|%|]{/c} for {c_number}{SF_17}{/c} second when damaged by his {c_important}Whirlwind{/c}.
{c_label}Madawc:{/c} {c_number}[{SF_18}*100|%|]{/c} chance to Stun enemies for {c_number}{SF_19}{/c} seconds when using his {c_important}Upheaval{/c}.
{c_important}Iron Maelstrom{/c} gains {c_number}[{SF_10}*100|%+|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Chance and deals {c_number}[{SF_11}*100|%x|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Damage
While {c_important}Wrath of the Berserker{/c} is active, every {c_number}{SF_5}{/c} Fury you spend increases {c_important}{u}Berserk's{/u}{/c} damage bonus by {c_number}[{SF_6}*100|%x|]{/c}.
While {c_important}Call of the Ancients{/c} is active, gain {c_number}[{SF_13}*100|%+|]{/c} bonus Attack Speed and {c_number}[{SF_14}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage.
While {c_important}Wrath of the Berserker{/c} is active, gain {c_number}[{SF_3} * 100|%+|]{/c} increased Movement Speed and increase Fury Generation by {c_number}[{SF_14} * 100|%x|]{/c}.

{c_label}Cooldown:{/c_label} {c_resource}{Cooldown Time}{/c_resource} seconds
{if:ADVANCED_TOOLTIP}{c_label}Lucky Hit Chance: {/c}{c_resource}[{Combat Effect Chance}|%|]{/c}
{/if}Call upon 3 Ancients to aid you in battle for {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds.
{icon:bullet, 1.2} {c_label}Korlic{/c} leaps at enemies, dealing {c_number}{payload:LEAP_TOOLTIP}{/c} damage and swings his weapons in a frenzy, dealing {c_number}{payload:FRENZY_TOOLTIP}{/c} damage per hit.
{icon:bullet, 1.2} {c_label}Talic{/c} spins in a whirlwind rapidly attacking enemies for {c_number}{payload:WHIRLWIND_TOOLTIP}{/c} damage.
{icon:bullet, 1.2} {c_label}Madawc{/c} upheaves the ground, dealing {c_number}{payload:UPHEAVAL_TOOLTIP}{/c} damage.
Gain {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} Damage Reduction while {c_important}{u}Berserking{/u}{/c}.

{c_label}Cooldown:{/c_label} {c_resource}{Cooldown Time}{/c_resource} seconds
{if:ADVANCED_TOOLTIP}{c_label}Lucky Hit Chance: {/c}{c_resource}[[{Combat_Effect_Chance_Script_Formula_Override:14}|%|]{/c}
{/if}Activate three times to attach chains to each of your weapons and perform an attack:
{icon:bullet, 1.2} First your Two-Handed Bludgeoning weapon slams into the ground, dealing {c_number}{payload:DAMAGE}{/c} damage and Stunning enemies for {c_number}{buffduration:STUN}{/c} seconds.
{icon:bullet, 1.2} Second your Two-Handed Slashing weapon swipes in front of you, dealing {c_number}{payload:TOOLTIP_DAMAGE_SLASH}{/c} damage and inflicting {c_number}{dot:TOOLTIP_DAMAGE_SLASH_BLEED}{/c} Bleeding damage over {c_number}{buffduration:TOOLTIP_DAMAGE_SLASH_BLEED}{/c} seconds.
{icon:bullet, 1.2} Third your Dual Wield weapons swing around you, dealing {c_number}{payload:TOOLTIP_DAMAGE_DUALWIELDING}{/c} damage per hit.

{c_label}Cooldown:{/c_label} {c_resource}{Cooldown Time}{/c_resource} seconds
Bellow a mighty war cry, increasing your damage dealt by {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|1%x|]{/c} for {c_number}[{SF_2}|1|]{/c} seconds, and Nearby allies for {c_number}[{SF_5}|1|]{/c} seconds.

1HSword_Unique_Barb_101.desc: Skills using this weapon deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*100|1%x|]{/c} increased damage per point of Fury you have, but you lose {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Fury every second.
1HSword_Unique_Barb_101.flavor:
"Without him the wine is less sweet, the hearth less warm, and our blades less keen. Our blood brother is gone, but Bul-Kathos willing, we will meet again one day."
- Sorrowsong for Ramaladni
1HSword_Unique_Barb_101.name: Ramaladni's Magnum Opus

2HAxe_Unique_Barb_001.desc: {c_important}Steel Grasp{/c} launches {c_number}2{/c} additional chains. Enemies hit by {c_important}Steel Grasp{/c} are Slowed by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*100|%|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
2HAxe_Unique_Barb_001.flavor:
"Weapons wielded by the fiercest warriors often catch the eye of the Ancient spirits. If the wielder is worthy, the spirits may bless the steel with their strength."
- Gerti, Oxen Tribe Forgemaster
2HAxe_Unique_Barb_001.name: Ancients' Oath

2HMace_Unique_Barb_001.desc: {c_important}Upheaval{/c} ignites the ground Burning enemies for an additional {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
2HMace_Unique_Barb_001.flavor: The demon prince Ikonoth slew hundreds of the Heavenly Host with this infernal hammer before falling to none other than the Archangel Imperius himself.
2HMace_Unique_Barb_001.name: Hellhammer

2HMace_Unique_Barb_100.desc: {c_important}Death Blow{/c} creates a shockwave, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of its Base damage to enemies. Enemies who die to this effect also reset {c_important}Death Blow's{/c} Cooldown.
2HMace_Unique_Barb_100.flavor: The malformed snake creatures that live in the swamps are not content with simply killing their prey. They seem to take a malicious pleasure from inflicting as much suffering as possible before death.
2HMace_Unique_Barb_100.name: Overkill

2HSword_Unique_Barb_002.desc: While using this weapon, damaging at least one enemy with {c_important}Rupture{/c} creates a blood pool that inflicts {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Bleeding damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds. Enemies standing in the pool take {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased Bleeding damage.
2HSword_Unique_Barb_002.flavor:
"We've been fighting these flesh-eaters for so long, been soaked in so much blood, that after a while it's difficult to tell what side you're truly on."
- Daelyr, Crane Tribe warrior
2HSword_Unique_Barb_002.name: Fields of Crimson

Amulet_Unique_Barb_100.desc: Increase {c_important}Frenzy's{/c} maximum stacks by {c_number}[Affix_Value_1]{/c}. While you have maximum {c_important}Frenzy{/c}, your other Skills gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_2|%+|]{/c} increased Attack Speed.
Amulet_Unique_Barb_100.flavor:
"The change that overtook my brother in battle was terrifying. His eyes turned hard like diamonds, and the way he moved... it was like he was dancing to music only he could hear."
- Captain Dervin
Amulet_Unique_Barb_100.name: Battle Trance

Boots_Unique_Barb_100.desc: After gaining the final damage bonus from the {c_important}Walking Arsenal{/c} Key Passive, you automatically cast {c_important}Ground Stomp{/c} and gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} Fury. This cannot happen more than once every {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} seconds.
Boots_Unique_Barb_100.flavor:
"While many Barbarians remained in the Dreadlands, small groups from the Oxen, Crane and Bear tribes instead chose to search the land for a new home."
- A History of the Children of Bul-Kathos
Boots_Unique_Barb_100.name: 100,000 Steps

Chest_Unique_Barb_100.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to reduce the Cooldowns of your Non-{c_important}Ultimate{/c} Skills by {c_number}[Affix_Value_2|1|]{/c} seconds when you inflict Bleeding on Elites.
Chest_Unique_Barb_100.flavor: Harrogath, the final bastion of resistance against Baal's assault on Mt. Arreat was destroyed along with the Worldstone. The survivors never forgave the betrayal that led to the loss of their home.
Chest_Unique_Barb_100.name: Rage of Harrogath

Gloves_Unique_Barb_001.desc: {c_important}Whirlwind{/c} explodes after it ends, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of the total Base damage dealt to surrounding enemies as Fire damage.
Gloves_Unique_Barb_001.flavor:
"The brutish construction of these gloves belies the strength they bestow. Gohr was clearly no craftsman, but it would be foolish to ignore the triumph of his work."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Gloves_Unique_Barb_001.name: Gohr's Devastating Grips

TESTstephen_unique_barbarian_mace2h.desc: (PH) Consecutive Hammer of the Ancients increase the next cast's damage by {c_number}{Affix_Value_1}%{/c} up to {{Affix_Value_1}*2}% and its radius by {c_number}{Affix_Value_2}%{/c} up to {{Affix_Value_2}*2}%.
TESTstephen_unique_barbarian_mace2h.name: of Hammering

Legendary_Druid_115.desc: {c_important}Lightning Storm{/c} Critical Strikes spawn {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} {c_important}Dancing Bolts{/c} that seek enemies in the area dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Lightning damage.
Legendary_Druid_115.name: Lightning Dancer's

Legendary_Druid_116.desc: {c_important}Grizzly Rage{/c} now shapeshifts you into a Dire Werewolf. As a Dire Werewolf you gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%+|]{/c} Movement Speed instead of Damage Reduction and a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*2|%|]{/c} Spirit cost reduction bonus. In addition, kills Heal you for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life.
Legendary_Druid_116.name: Dire Wolf's

Legendary_Druid_117.desc: Gain {c_number}1{/c} additional Companion. In addition, your {c_important}Companion{/c} Skills deal {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} bonus damage.
Legendary_Druid_117.name: of the Stampede

Legendary_Druid_118.desc: {c_important}Boulder{/c} is now a {c_important}Core{/c} Skill and costs {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Spirit to cast dealing {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of normal damage.
Legendary_Druid_118.name: of Metamorphic Stone

Legendary_Druid_119.desc: While dashing, {c_important}Shred{/c} seeks out Nearby Poisoned enemies instantly dealing {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of the Poisoning damage to them.
Legendary_Druid_119.name: of the Blurred Beast

legendary_druid_002.desc: After killing an enemy with {c_important}Shred{/c}, your next {c_important}Werewolf{/c} Skill generates {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} more Spirit and deals {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage.
legendary_druid_002.name: of the Unsatiated

legendary_druid_005.desc: When you are struck as a Werebear you have a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to gain {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Spirit.
legendary_druid_005.name: Mangled

legendary_druid_010.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} {c_important}Wind Shear{/c} has up to a {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to fully restore your Spirit.
legendary_druid_010.name: of the Calm Breeze

legendary_druid_013.desc: {c_important}Hurricane{/c} damage is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%x|]{/c} each second while active.
legendary_druid_013.name: of the Tempest

legendary_druid_018.desc: Damage from {c_important}Earth{/c} Skills Slow enemies hit by {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_druid_018.name: of Quicksand

legendary_druid_023.desc: {c_important}Earth{/c} Skills deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} more Critical Strike Damage to Crowd Controlled enemies.
legendary_druid_023.name: Crashstone

legendary_druid_026.desc: The duration of {c_important}Earthen Bulwark{/c} is increased by {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} seconds. In addition, killing an enemy with {c_important}Earth{/c} Skills replenishes {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} of your active {c_important}Earthen Bulwark's{/c} {c_important}{u}Barrier{/u}{/c}.
legendary_druid_026.name: of Mending Stone

legendary_druid_028.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance when dealing Lightning damage to overload the target for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds, causing any direct damage you deal to them to pulse {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} additional damage to surrounding enemies.
legendary_druid_028.name: Overcharged

legendary_druid_029.desc:
Casting a {c_important}Storm{/c} Skill grants your {c_important}Earth{/c} Skills {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%x|]{/c} Critical Strike Damage for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.

Casting a {c_important}Earth{/c} Skill increases the Critical Strike Chance of {c_important}Storm{/c} Skills by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1 /3.75|1%+|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.

legendary_druid_038.desc: Damaging a Poisoned enemy with a {c_important}Werebear{/c} Skill will instantly deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of the Poisoning damage and consume the Poisoning.
legendary_druid_038.name: of the Changeling's Debt

legendary_druid_042.desc: When you use a {c_important}Shapeshifting{/c} Skill that changes your form, gain {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Life. If you are at full Life, gain the same amount as {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c}.
legendary_druid_042.name: Skinwalker's

legendary_druid_047.desc: {c_important}Earth Spike{/c} launches spikes in a line and has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} second Cooldown.
legendary_druid_047.name: Seismic-shift

legendary_druid_049.desc: {c_important}Trample{/c} now summons {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} {c_important}Landslide{/c} pillars of earth during its duration that deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} normal damage. {c_important}Trample{/c} is now also a {c_important}Nature Magic{/c} and {c_important}Earth{/c} Skill.
legendary_druid_049.name: of the Trampled Earth

legendary_druid_059.desc: Critical Strikes with {c_important}Shred{/c} deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of the damage dealt as Lightning damage to the target and surrounding enemies.
legendary_druid_059.name: Stormclaw's

legendary_druid_060.desc: Increase your Maximum Spirit by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} and Spirit Generation by {c_number}[Affix_Value_2|%x|]{/c} while {c_important}Grizzly Rage{/c} is active.

legendary_druid_062.desc: {c_important}Cyclone Armor{/c} also provides Physical Damage Reduction. In addition, {c_important}Cyclone Armor{/c} will also be applied to all Nearby Allies.
legendary_druid_062.name: of Cyclonic Force

legendary_druid_063.desc: {c_important}Landslide's{/c} earth pillars each strike a second time and deal an additional {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} bonus damage per hit.
legendary_druid_063.name: of The Aftershock

legendary_druid_066.desc: {c_important}Pulverize{/c} is now also an {c_important}Earth{/c} Skill. After casting {c_important}Pulverize{/c}, tectonic spikes continue to deal {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.

legendary_druid_071.desc: Your {c_important}Core{/c} Skills deal up to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|] {/c} increased damage based on your amount of {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c}.
legendary_druid_071.name: of Retaliation

legendary_druid_074.desc: {c_important}Pulverize{/c} creates a shockwave that travels forward, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of its damage to targets in the path.
legendary_druid_074.name: Shockwave

legendary_druid_075.desc: Your {c_important}Wolf{/c} Companions are now {c_important}Werewolf{/c} Companions. {c_important}Werewolf{/c} Companions deal {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%+|]{/c} additional damage and can spread {c_important}Rabies{/c}.
legendary_druid_075.name: of the Alpha

legendary_druid_077.desc: {c_important}Blood Howl{/c} increases Critical Strike Chance by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%+|]{/c}. In addition, {c_important}Blood Howl{/c} also affects Nearby Companions and Players for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_druid_077.name: Nighthowler's

legendary_druid_078.desc: {c_important}Werewolf{/c} Skills function as {c_important}Storm{/c} Skills and {c_important}Werebear{/c} Skills function as {c_important}Earth{/c} Skills for the {c_important}Nature's Fury{/c} Key Passive.
legendary_druid_078.name: of Nature's Savagery

legendary_druid_080.desc: {c_important}Core{/c} Skills deal an additional {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%x|]{/c} damage for each active Companion.
legendary_druid_080.name: Shepherd's

legendary_druid_100.desc: Gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} Damage Reduction while Shapeshifted into a Werewolf.
legendary_druid_100.name: Vigorous

legendary_druid_102.desc: {c_important}Debilitating Roar{/c} is now a {c_important}Werewolf{/c} Skill. In addition, {c_important}Debilitating Roar{/c} will Immobilize Poisoned enemies for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds.
legendary_druid_102.name: of the Dark Howl

legendary_druid_104.desc: The duration of {c_important}Grizzly Rage{/c} is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} seconds. In addition, Critical Strikes while {c_important}Grizzly Rage{/c} is active increase your Critical Strike Damage by {c_number}[Affix_Value_2|%x|]{/c} for the duration.
legendary_druid_104.name: of the Rampaging Werebeast

legendary_druid_106.desc: Your Companions gain the bonuses from the {c_important}Bestial Rampage{/c} Key Passive.
legendary_druid_106.name: of the Wildrage

legendary_druid_108.desc: When you have {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c} your {c_important}Earth{/c} Skills gain {c_number}+[Affix_Value_1]{/c} Ranks.
legendary_druid_108.name: Ballistic

legendary_druid_109.desc: While {c_important}Hurricane{/c} is active, gain {c_number}+[Affix_Value_1]{/c} Ranks to your {c_important}Shapeshifting{/c} Skills.
legendary_druid_109.name: Stormshifter's

legendary_druid_111.desc: Critical Strikes with {c_important}Storm{/c} Skills charge the air around you for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds causing a {c_important}Lightning Strike{/c} to periodically hit an enemy in the area for {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Lightning damage. This duration can be extended by additional Critical Strikes.

legendary_druid_112.desc: The {c_important}Earthen Might{/c} Key Passive also applies to your {c_important}Storm{/c} Skills.
legendary_druid_112.name: Mighty Storm's

legendary_druid_113.desc: When the {c_important}Nature's Fury{/c} Key Passive triggers a free Skill, your non-{c_important}Ultimate{/c} Cooldowns of the opposite type are reduced by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} seconds.
legendary_druid_113.name: Symbiotic

legendary_druid_114.desc: Gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} bonus amount to your next {c_important}Earthen Bulwark{/c} for each enemy you Crowd Control up to a maximum of {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c}.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_001.desc: {c_important}Critical Strikes{/c} from your {c_important}Storm{/c} Skills make enemies {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} |4second:seconds;. Enemies that are already {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} have its duration extended by {c_number}[{SF_1}|1|]{/c} seconds instead.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_002.desc: {c_important}Hurricane{/c} and {c_important}Cataclysm{/c} create a {c_important}Tornado{/c} every {c_number}[SF_0|1|]{/c} seconds while they are active.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_003.desc: {c_important}Storm{/c} Skills deal {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|x%|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Damage against {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} or Immobilized enemies.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_004.desc: Your {c_important}Earth{/c} Skills have an additional {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%+|]{/c} chance to {c_important}{u}Overpower{/u}{/c}.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_005.desc: When you kill an enemy with an {c_important}{u}Overpowering{/u}{/c} hit, you automatically gain {c_important}Earthen Bulwark{/c}. This can only happen once every {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_006.desc: Your {c_important}Earth{/c} Skills deal {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|x%|]{/c} increased damage to enemies afflicted by Crowd Control.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_007.desc: While in Werebear form, you deal {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|x%|]{/c} increased damage, up to {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|x%|]{/c}, for every {c_number}[{SF_2}*100|%|]{/c} difference in current Life percent between you and the enemy.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_008.desc: {c_important}Werebear{/c} skills have an additional {c_number}[{SF_3}*100|%|]{/c} chance to {c_important}{u}Overpower{/u}{/c} and Knockdown for {c_number}[SF_2|1|]{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_009.desc: While in Werebear form, you apply {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%+|]{/c} bonus {c_important}Fortify{/c}.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_010.desc: Critical Strikes with {c_important}Werewolf{/c} Skills restore {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} Spirit.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_011.desc: Your {c_important}Werewolf{/c} Skills gain an additional {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%+|]{/c} Critical Strike Chance against Poisoned enemies.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_012.desc: While there are {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} or more Poisoned enemies Nearby, you deal {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|x%|]{/c} increased damage.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_013.desc: After shapeshifting, your Spirit costs are reduced by {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} for {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds, up to {c_number}[{SF_0}*100*{SF_1}|%|]{/c}.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_014.desc:
Casting a {c_important}Storm{/c} Skill increases the Critical Strike Chance of your next {c_important}Werewolf{/c} Skill by {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%+|]{/c}.

Casting an {c_important}Earth{/c} Skill increases the Critical Strike Damage of your next {c_important}Werebear{/c} Skill by {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%x|]{/c}.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_015.desc: Your {c_important}Earth{/c} Skills have an additional {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%+|]{/c} chance to {c_important}{u}Overpower{/u}{/c} enemies that are {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c}.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_016.desc: Your {c_important}Nature Magic{/c} Skills deal {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage against enemies affected by your {c_important}Debilitating Roar{/c}.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_017.desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} {c_important}Nature Magic{/c} Skills have up to a {c_number}[{SF_0}|%|]{/c} chance to entangle the enemy with vines, Immobilizing them for {c_number}[{SF_1}]{/c} seconds and Poisoning them for {c_number}[{SF_2}*100|%|]{/c} of the Base damage dealt over {c_number}[SF_3]{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_018.desc: After spending {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} Spirit, you deal {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|x%|]{/c} increased damage for {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds.

{c_label}Lucky Hit: {/c}Your {c_important}Wolves'{/c} attacks have up to a {c_number}[{SF_10}|%|]{/c} chance to {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c} you for {c_number}[{SF_17}*100|%|]{/c} Base Life {c_number}([Max(1,{fortified:MOD_B_FORTIFY})|0|]){/c}.
Your Critical Strike Chance is increased by {c_number}[{SF_16}*100|%+|]{/c} against enemies strangled by {c_important}Vine Creeper{/c}.
{c_important}Vine Creeper's{/c} active Poisoning duration is increased by {c_number}{SF_14}{/c} seconds.
{c_number}{SF_14}{/c} additional {c_important}Ravens{/c} periodically attack enemies.
Enemies inside the swarm of {c_important}Ravens{/c} when it is activated become {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_11}{/c} seconds.
{c_important}Rabies{/c} deals its total Poisoning damage in {c_number}[SF_3]{/c} seconds instead of {c_number}[SF_10]{/c}.
Enemies affected by {c_important}Hurricane{/c} deal {c_number}[{SF_11}*100|%|]{/c} less damage.
Casting {c_important}Trample{/c} grants {c_number}{SF_11}{/c} Spirit.
{c_important}Blood Howl{/c} also increases your Attack Speed by {c_number}[{SF_3}*100|%+|]{/c} for {c_number}{buffduration:MOD_ATTACK_SPEED_BONUS}{/c} seconds.
Enemies Knocked Back by {c_important}Cyclone Armor{/c} become {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_14}{/c} seconds.
{c_important}Debilitating Roar{/c} also Slows enemies by {c_number}[{SF_9}*100|%|]{/c} for its duration.
{c_important}Debilitating Roar{/c} also Heals you for {c_number}[{SF_8}*100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life {c_number}([PlayerHealthMax() * SF_8]){/c} each second for its duration.
Casting {c_important}Earthen Bulwark{/c} grants {c_number}[{SF_10}*100|%|]{/c} Base Life {c_number}([Max(1,{fortified:MOD_FORTIFY})|0|]){/c} as {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c}.
{c_important}Shred's{/c} second and third attacks also perform a dash. In addition, {c_important}Shred's{/c} Critical Strike Damage is increased by {c_number}[{SF_5}*100|%x|]{/c}.
{c_important}Lightning Storm{/c} has a {c_number}[{SF_8}*100|%|]{/c} chance to Immobilize enemies hit for {c_number}{buffduration:IMMOBILIZE}{/c} seconds.
Enemies hit with {c_important}Tornado{/c} have a {c_number}[{SF_19}*100|%|]{/c} chance to become {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_20}{/c} seconds.
Enemies are Stunned for {c_number}{SF_12}{/c} seconds when they are {c_important}{u}Overpowered{/u}{/c} with {c_important}Pulverize{/c}.
When you strike an Immobilized or Stunned enemy with {c_important}Landslide{/c}, an additional pillar of earth is formed.
{c_important}Maul{/c} has a {c_number}[{SF_6}*100|%|]{/c} chance to Knock Down enemies for {c_number}{buffduration:MOD_B_KNOCKDOWN}{/c} seconds.
{c_important}Wind Shear{/c} grants {c_number}{SF_4}{/c} additional Spirit for each enemy hit beyond the first.
{c_important}Storm Strike{/c} chains to {c_number}[SF_7]{/c} additional targets.
{c_important}Claw{/c} has a {c_number}[{SF_9}*100|%|]{/c} chance to attack twice.
Summon a second {c_important}Earth Spike{/c} when hitting an Immobilized or Stunned enemy.

Shapeshift into a Werebear and bellow a mighty roar, reducing Nearby enemies' damage dealt by {c_number}[{SF_2} * 100|%|]{/c} for {c_number}{buffduration:BUFF_DAMAGE_DEALT_REDUCTION}{/c} seconds.

{/if}{c_label}Passive:{/c} A vine creeper periodically emerges from the ground every {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds and applies {c_number}{dot:TOOLTIP_PET_POISON}{/c} Poisoning damage over {c_number}{buffduration:TOOLTIP_PET_POISON}{/c} seconds to an enemy in the area.

After being a Werebear for {c_number}{buffduration:TIMER_BEAR}{/c} seconds, deal {c_number}[{SF_2} * 100|%x|]{/c} increased damage for {c_number}{buffduration:BUFF_ATTACK_DAMAGE}{/c} seconds.
Every {c_number}6th{/c} {c_important}Werewolf{/c} Skill hit Critically Strikes and deals {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage.

Gain {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%x|]{/c} additional Maximum Life while in Werebear form and for {c_number}{buffduration:BONUS_MAX_HEALTH}{/c} seconds after leaving Werebear form.

While {c_important}{u}Healthy{/u}{/c}, deal {c_number}[{SF_1} * 100|%x|]{/c} increased damage.
Poisoned enemies are slowed by {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c}.
When a {c_important}Shapeshifting{/c} Skill transforms you into a different form, it deals {c_number}[{SF_1} * 100|%x|]{/c} increased damage.
Shapeshifting {c_important}{u}Fortifies{/u}{/c} you for {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} Base Life {c_number}([Max(1,{fortified:FORTIFY_CASTER})|0|]){/c}.
{c_important}Nature Magic{/c} Skills deal {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage to Elites.
Maximum Spirit is increased by {c_number}{SF_0}{/c}.
Your companions deal {c_number}[{SF_0}  * 100|%x|]{/c} bonus damage.
Every {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds, a lightning strike hits a Nearby enemy dealing {c_number}{payload:DAMAGE_TOOLTIP}{/c} damage.
When you remain in Werebear form for at least {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds, your next Skill will {c_important}{u}Overpower{/u}{/c}.
You gain {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%|]{/c} Damage Reduction for {c_number}{buffduration:DAMAGE_REDUCTION}{/c} seconds after using a {c_important}Defensive{/c} Skill.
Upon shapeshifting into a Werewolf or Werebear, gain {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%|]{/c} Damage Reduction against Elites for {c_number}{buffduration:BUFF_DAMAGE_REDUCTION}{/c} seconds.

Your {c_important}Storm{/c} Skills grant {c_number}{SF_4}{/c} Spirit and deal {c_number}[{SF_1} * 100|%x|]{/c} increased damage when damaging a {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c}, Immobilized or Slowed enemy.

{c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Damaging enemies with {c_important}Earth{/c} Skills has up to a {c_number}{SF_0}%{/c} chance to:
{icon:bullet,1.2} Restore all of your Spirit
{icon:bullet,1.2} Cause your attacks to be guaranteed Critical Strikes for {c_number}{buffduration:CRIT_CHANCE_BONUS}{/c} seconds

This chance is increased by:
{icon:bullet,1.2} {c_number}{SF_3}%{/c} for Critical Strikes
{icon:bullet,1.2} {c_number}{SF_4}%{/c} if the target is Stunned, Immobilized, or Knocked Back

Reduce the duration of Control Impairing Effects by {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%|]{/c}. Triple this effect while you have {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c} for over {c_number}[{SF_2}*100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life.

Your {c_important}Earth{/c} Skills deal {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage to {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} enemies.

Your {c_important}Storm{/c} Skills deal {c_number}[{SF_4}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage to enemies that are Stunned, Immobilized, or Knocked Back.

{c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Dealing Lightning damage to enemies has a {c_number}{SF_1}%{/c} chance to Immobilize them for {c_number}{buffduration:BUFF_IMMOBILIZE}{/c} seconds.

If the target is already Immobilized, the Lightning damage dealt to them is increased by {c_number}[{SF_3} * 100|%x|]{/c} instead.

power.skill_desc: Increase the duration of {c_important}Hurricane{/c} and {c_important}Cataclysm{/c} by {c_number}[{SF_1} * 100|%x|]{/c}.

{c_important}Nature Magic{/c} Skills deal {c_number}[{SF_1} * 100|%x|]{/c} increased damage. Triple this bonus if an {c_important}Earth{/c} Skill is the next Skill cast after a {c_important}Storm{/c} Skill, or a  {c_important}Storm{/c} Skill is the next Skill cast after an {c_important}Earth{/c} Skill.
Critical Strike Chance against Close enemies is increased by {c_number}[{SF_1} * 100|%+|]{/c}.

{c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_number}{SF_0}%{/c} chance when dealing damage to a {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c}, Immobilized or Stunned enemy that a lightning strike also hits dealing {c_number}{payload:DAMAGE_TOOLTIP_ONLY}{/c} damage.
Increase your Non-Physical Resistances by {c_number}[{SF_1} * 100|%|]{/c}.
{c_important}Nature Magic{/c} Skills that consume Spirit Heal you for {c_number}[{SF_1} * 100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life {c_number}([Max(1,PlayerHealthMax() * SF_1)]){/c}.
{c_important}Lacerate's{/c} initial strike is guaranteed to Critically Strike and deals {c_number}[{SF_15}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage.

Gain {c_number}[{SF_2}*100|%|]{/c} Base Life {c_number}([Max(1,{fortified:MOD_2_FORTIFY_PER_SECOND})|0|]){/c} as {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c} per second while {c_important}Grizzly Rage{/c} is active.
Lightning strikes from {c_important}Cataclysm{/c} make enemies {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}2{/c} seconds.
While in Werebear form, you receive {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%+|]{/c} additional Healing from all sources.
Killing an enemy affected by {c_important}Petrify{/c} grants {c_number}{SF_5}{/c} Spirit.
Each time {c_important}Lacerate{/c} deals a Critical Strike, Heal for {c_number}[{SF_14}*100|%|]{/c} Maximum Life {c_number}([PlayerHealthMax() * SF_14]){/c}.
You are {c_important}{u}Unstoppable{/u}{/c} while {c_important}Grizzly Rage{/c} is active.
{c_important}Cataclysm's{/c} duration is increased by {c_number}{SF_23}{/c} seconds.
{c_important}Petrify's{/c} effect durations are increased by {c_number}{SF_6}{/c} second.

Against Bosses, the Critical Strike Damage bonus is increased to {c_number}[{SF_8}*100|%x|]{/c} and its duration is increased to {c_number}{buffduration:BUFF_PETRIFIED_BOSS_CRIT}{/c} seconds.
{c_important}Rabies{/c} spreads {c_number}[{SF_4}*100|%|]{/c} faster.
Deal {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%x|]{/c} increased damage to Distant enemies. Double this bonus if they are also Slowed, Stunned, Immobilized, or Knocked Back.

Druid_Passive_Deer_04.desc: Reduce the duration of Control Impairing Effects by {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c}.
Druid_Passive_Deer_04.name: Advantageous Beast

Druid_Passive_Snake_01.desc: Every {c_number}{SF_0}th{/c} kill will cause your next {c_important}Earth{/c} Skill to {c_important}{u}Overpower{/u}{/c}.
Druid_Passive_Snake_01.name: Obsidian Slam

Druid_Passive_Snake_02.desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Dealing Lightning damage has up to a {c_number}[{SF_0}|%|]{/c} chance to cause the target to emit a static discharge, dealing {c_number}{payload:DAMAGE}{/c} Lightning damage to surrounding enemies.
Druid_Passive_Snake_02.name: Overload

Druid_Passive_Snake_03.desc: Critical Strikes with {c_important}Shapeshifting{/c} Skills Heal you for {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%|]{/c} Maximum Life {c_number}([PlayerHealthMax() * SF_0]){/c}.
Druid_Passive_Snake_03.name: Masochistic

Druid_Passive_Snake_04.desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} {c_important}Nature Magic{/c} Skills have up to a {c_number}{SF_0}%{/c} chance to reduce the Cooldown of your {c_important}Ultimate{/c} Skill by {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} seconds.
Druid_Passive_Snake_04.name: Calm Before the Storm

Druid_Passive_Wolf_01.desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Critical Strikes have up to a {c_number}{SF_0}%{/c} chance to reset the Cooldowns of your {c_important}Companion{/c} Skills.
Druid_Passive_Wolf_01.name: Packleader

Druid_Passive_Wolf_02.desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Dealing damage has up to a {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} chance to restore {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} Spirit.
Druid_Passive_Wolf_02.name: Energize

Druid_Passive_Wolf_03.desc: {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life when you use a {c_important}Defensive{/c} Skill.
Druid_Passive_Wolf_03.name: Bolster

Druid_Passive_Wolf_04.desc: Extend the duration of {c_important}Ultimate{/c} Skills by {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%|]{/c}.
Druid_Passive_Wolf_04.name: Calamity

1HAxe_Unique_Druid_100.desc: Gain {c_important}{u}Stealth{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} seconds when killing enemies with {c_important}Shred{/c}. Breaking {c_important}{u}Stealth{/u}{/c} with an attack grants Ambush which guarantees Critical Strikes for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds.
1HAxe_Unique_Druid_100.flavor: The nights preceding the full moon are sometimes far more dangerous than the event itself. The frenzy has begun to rise, yet the night is just dark enough to obscure a hunter from their prey's sight.
1HAxe_Unique_Druid_100.name: Waxing Gibbous

2HStaff_Unique_Druid_001.desc: {c_important}Claw{/c} is now a {c_important}Storm{/c} Skill and also casts {c_important}Storm Strike{/c} at {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} normal damage.
2HStaff_Unique_Druid_001.flavor:
"She has existed in Scosglen since before Fiacla-Gar walked the land. Her purpose is a mystery to us all. However, approach her with deference; she may grant you her counsel."
- Airidah, to Donan
2HStaff_Unique_Druid_001.name: Greatstaff of the Crone

Chest_Unique_Druid_002.desc: Werewolf form is now your true form, and you gain {c_number}+2{/c} Ranks to all {c_important}Werewolf{/c} Skills.
Chest_Unique_Druid_002.flavor:
"He was not a victim of the curse - he sought it out. As his skin split and his bones cracked, his laughter never ceased." 
 Tale of the Mad Nobleman
Chest_Unique_Druid_002.name: Mad Wolf's Glee

Chest_Unique_Druid_003.desc: Werebear form is now your true form, and you gain {c_number}+2{/c} Ranks to all {c_important}Werebear{/c} Skills.
Chest_Unique_Druid_003.flavor: When the Days of Ash began, the great druid Nafain reminded his disciples that nothing, not even the loss of their humanity, was too great a sacrifice to protect Tr Dlra from Astaroth's flames.
Chest_Unique_Druid_003.name: Insatiable Fury

Helm_Unique_Druid_100.desc:
{c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} {c_important}Storm{/c} Skills have up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to grant {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Spirit.

Your base {c_important}Storm{/c} Skills are now also {c_important}Werewolf{/c} Skills
Helm_Unique_Druid_100.flavor:
"Listen, child, to the music of the storm. It has its own rhythm. Its own melody. Hear how beautifully it sings, and perhaps one day you will be able to join in its harmony."
 Airidah
Helm_Unique_Druid_100.name: Tempest Roar

Helm_Unique_Druid_101.desc: Your {c_important}Earth{/c} Skills are now also {c_important}Werebear{/c} Skills and {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c} you for {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1|1|]{/c}.
Helm_Unique_Druid_101.flavor:
"Roots from the Great Oak growing at the seaward statue of Vasily will, on rare occasions, be found twisted back upon themselves, suffused with ferocious magic."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Helm_Unique_Druid_101.name: Vasily's Prayer

Pants_Unique_Druid_001.desc: Your {c_important}Wolf{/c} Companions are infused with the power of the storm, dealing Lightning damage and gaining the {c_important}Storm Howl{/c} ability.
Pants_Unique_Druid_001.flavor:
"The storm's rage is my own, brother. I call, and the skies roar in reply."
- Vasily, to Bul-Kathos
Pants_Unique_Druid_001.name: Storm's Companion

Ring_Unique_Druid_003.desc:
Gain a bonus when you kill with a {c_important}Shapeshifting{/c} Skill:
{icon:bullet}{c_gold}Werewolf:{/c} Your next Non-{c_important}Ultimate{/c} {c_important}Werebear{/c} Skill costs no Resource and has no Cooldown.
{icon:bullet}{c_gold}Werebear:{/c} Your next {c_important}Werewolf{/c} Skill will Heal you for {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} when damage is first dealt.
Ring_Unique_Druid_003.flavor:
"By fang, claw, spear, or sword - send the bastards back to the flames from which they crawled! Soak the peat with their blood! For Fiacla-Gar! For Scosglen!"
- Nafain, during the Days of Ash
Ring_Unique_Druid_003.name: Hunter's Zenith

Legendary_Generic_110.desc: Critical Strikes with {c_important}Core{/c} Skills increase your Attack Speed by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%+|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
Legendary_Generic_110.name: Accelerating

Legendary_Generic_111.desc: You have {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%+|]{/c} increased Crowd Control Duration and deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage to {c_important}{u}Unstoppable{/u}{/c} enemies.
Legendary_Generic_111.name: Exploiter's

legendary_generic_006.desc: Gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} of your Primary Resource for every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} of your Life that you Heal.
legendary_generic_006.name: Starlight

legendary_generic_009.desc: {c_important}Basic{/c} Skills grant {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} Damage Reduction for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds.
legendary_generic_009.name: of Might

legendary_generic_011.desc: Damaging an Elite enemy grants you a {c_important}{u}Barrier{/u}{/c} absorbing up to {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds. This effect can only happen once every {c_number}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} seconds.
legendary_generic_011.name: of the Protector

legendary_generic_014.desc: Deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%x|]{/c} increased damage for each second you stand still, up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%x|]{/c}.
legendary_generic_014.name: of Inner Calm

legendary_generic_016.desc: Critical Strikes grant {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%+|]{/c} Movement Speed for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} second, up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"*Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_generic_016.name: Wind Striker

legendary_generic_021.desc: Restore {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} of your Primary Resource when you Crowd Control an enemy.
legendary_generic_021.name: of the Umbral

legendary_generic_027.desc: Deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage while you have a {c_important}{u}Barrier{/u}{/c} active.
legendary_generic_027.name: Conceited

legendary_generic_034.desc: When hit while not {c_important}{u}Healthy{/u}{/c}, a magical bubble is summoned around you for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds. While standing in the bubble players are {c_important}{u}Immune{/u}{/c}. Can only occur once every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_generic_034.name: Protecting

legendary_generic_036.desc: You gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|2%x|]{/c} increased Armor for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds when you deal any form of damage, stacking up to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*Affix."Static Value 0"|2%x|]{/c}.
legendary_generic_036.name: of Disobedience

legendary_generic_038.desc: Distant enemies have a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} chance to be Stunned for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds when they hit you. You deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage to Stunned enemies.
legendary_generic_038.name: of Retribution

legendary_generic_063.desc: Skills deal up to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage based on your available Primary Resource when cast, receiving the maximum benefit while you have full Primary Resource.
legendary_generic_063.name: Edgemaster's

legendary_generic_065.desc: You Heal for {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1|1|]{/c} Life per second for each Close enemy, up to {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_2|1|]{/c} Life per second.
legendary_generic_065.name: of the Crowded Sage

legendary_generic_067.desc: Attacking enemies with a {c_important}Basic{/c} Skill increases the damage of your next {c_important}Core{/c} Skill cast by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c}, up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%x|]{/c}.
legendary_generic_067.name: of the Expectant

legendary_generic_100.desc: While {c_important}{u}Unstoppable{/u}{/c} and for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds after, you gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%+|]{/c} increased Movement Speed and can move freely through enemies.
legendary_generic_100.name: Ghostwalker

legendary_generic_102.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} When you hit a Crowd Controlled enemy, there is up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance for that Crowd Control effect to spread to another unaffected enemy.
legendary_generic_102.name: of Shared Misery

legendary_generic_103.desc: Becoming {c_important}{u}Injured{/u}{/c} while Crowd Controlled grants you {c_important}{u}Unstoppable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds. This effect has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} second Cooldown.
legendary_generic_103.name: Eluding

legendary_generic_104.desc: You have {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%+|]{/c} increased Dodge Chance versus enemies affected by Damage Over Time effects. When you Dodge you gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} of your Primary Resource.
legendary_generic_104.name: Assimilation

legendary_generic_106.desc: Thorns damage dealt has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to deal damage to all enemies around you.
legendary_generic_106.name: Needleflare

legendary_generic_107.desc: While you have a {c_important}{u}Barrier{/u}{/c} active, there is a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to ignore incoming direct damage from Distant enemies.
legendary_generic_107.name: of the Deflecting Barrier

legendary_generic_109.desc: You have {c_random}[Affix."Static Value 0" * Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Chance against {c_important}{u}Injured{/u}{/c} enemies. While you are {c_important}{u}Healthy{/u}{/c}, you gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased Crowd Control Duration.
legendary_generic_109.name: Smiting

Loadscreen Tips.TIP001: Remember to spend your Skill Points when you level up to unlock new Skills and Passives or improve existing ones!
Loadscreen Tips.TIP003: Be sure to fill up your Healing Potion at the Healer {icon:Marker_Healer, 2.0} before leaving town.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP004: Salvaging your items will produce materials used for crafting, and can also unlock new looks in your Wardrobe {icon:Marker_Wardrobe, 2.0}
Loadscreen Tips.TIP005: Items lose durability and become less effective when you revive from death. You can repair your equipment at a Blacksmith {icon:Marker_Blacksmith, 2.0}
Loadscreen Tips.TIP006: You can revive other Players by clicking on their spirits. They can rejoin the fight immediately!
Loadscreen Tips.TIP007: Activate any waypoints {icon:Marker_Waypoint, 2.0} that you encounter on your travels to unlock a new fast travel location.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP008: When you grow powerful enough an Occultist {icon:Marker_Essence, 2.0} can extract and replace the powers on your Legendary items.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP009: Realm Rewards are shared with every character of yours on that realm. Open your map and check out the Renown panel to see what you can earn while exploring Sanctuary!
Loadscreen Tips.TIP010: The state of Sanctuary is based on the party leader's progress.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP011: Combat damage text is colored to mean different things: {c:ffffec64}Critical Strike{/c}, {c:ff78fff1}Overpower{/c}, and {c:ffff9000}Critical Hit combined with Overpower{/c}.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP012: You can increase the potency of your Healing Potions by visiting the Alchemist {icon:Marker_Crafter_Alchemist, 2.0}
Loadscreen Tips.TIP013: After finishing the Campaign, new challenges and rewards await in the Nightmare and Torment World Tiers!
Loadscreen Tips.TIP014: Elite enemies include Champions, Elites, Bosses, and Bloodmarked Players.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP015: Higher World Tiers grant you much more Experience from killing monsters.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP016: The {c_highlight}Vulnerable{/c} status effect increases the damage taken by enemies for a short duration. It is represented by a {c:ff8158a9}purple{/c} glow around the Health Bar for enemies and a cracked Health Globe for you.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP017: The {c_highlight}Knockdown{/c} status effect prevents enemies from moving or taking action for a short duration. It can be removed through Unstoppable or Immune effects.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP018: The {c_highlight}Dazed{/c} status effect prevents enemies from attacking or using Skills for a short duration, but does not stop them from moving. It can be removed through Unstoppable or Immune effects.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP019: You are {c_highlight}Fortified{/c} and take reduced damage as long as you have more Fortify than current Life. Certain Skills or item effects can grant Fortify, which cannot exceed your Maximum Life.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP020: The {c_highlight}Tether{/c} status effect prevents enemies from walking out from inside of its radius. It can be removed through Unstoppable or Immune effects OR by destroying the target that you are tethered to.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP021: The {c_highlight}Fear{/c} status effect prevents enemies from moving or taking action AND causes the affected target to run away for a short duration. It can be removed through Unstoppable or Immune effects.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP022: Joining a party will transfer you to the party leader's world, the state of which is determined by the leader's progress through the Campaign.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP023: Upon reaching Level 15 and completing the {c_important}{u}Legacy of the Magi{/u}{/c} quest, Sorcerers unlock {c_important}{u}Enchantments{/u}{/c}, allowing them to utilize powerful passive versions of their Skills.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP024: Enemies are considered affected by Rogue {c_important}Traps{/c} when they are within a {c_important}Trap's{/c} persistent area or afflicted with its harmful effects.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP025: Characters in {c_important}{u}Stealth{/u}{/c} cannot be directly targeted with attacks, however their {c_important}{u}Stealth{/u}{/c} will be broken if they are hit with incidental damage or if they use an attack.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP026: Rogues can use {c_important}Imbuement{/c} Skills to modify some of their attacks to deal different types of Elemental damage and apply additional harmful effects.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP027: In each higher World Tier, monsters are more challenging. They run faster; their projectiles are more accurate and faster; their powerful attacks have reduced cooldown and are stronger; and Elite affixes are more powerful.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP028: {c_yellow}Champion{/c} monsters that appear in World Tier 3: Nightmare and World Tier 4: Torment have damage resistance auras which do not protect themselves. Focus on killing them first.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP029: Powerful, build-changing {c_yellow}Unique{/c} items can be found in World Tier 3: Nightmare and even more can be found in World Tier 4: Torment.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP030: Skills can trigger Lucky Hit effects. If a Skill has a {c_important}{u}Lucky Hit Chance{/u}{/c} of 50%, and an effect a 20% chance to Stun an enemy, then that Skill will Stun enemies on average 10% of the time.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP031: {c_important}{u}Overpowered{/u}{/c} attacks deal bonus damage to enemies based on the sum of your current Life and {c_important}{u}Fortified{/u}{/c} Life.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP032: Attacks have a 3% chance to {c_important}{u}Overpower{/u}{/c}.  This chance cannot be passively improved, but some effects can cause attacks to be guaranteed to {c_important}{u}Overpower{/u}{/c}.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP033: Necromancer Minions inherit 30% of most stats such as {c_important}{u}Critical Strike Chance{/u}{/c} and {c_important}{u}Attack Speed{/u}{/c}.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP034: Necromancers have various ways to drop {c_important}{u}Blood Orbs{/u}{/c}, which fall on the ground and heal them instantly when picked up.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP035: Necromancers have the ability to see and interact with Corpses.  Kill enemies to spawn their Corpse, and use that Corpse to raise Skeletons to fight for you!
Loadscreen Tips.TIP036: Necromancers can use the {c_important}{u}Book of the Dead{/u}{/c} to sacrifice the ability to summon their Minions for personal power.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP037: If all other Skeletons have been summoned, then Raise Skeleton will instead summon a {c_important}{u}Skeletal Priest{/u}{/c} who will temporarily buff all nearby Minions.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP038: Druids {c_important}{u}Shapeshift{/u}{/c} when they change into a different form, which can often grant them additional bonuses.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP039: Upon reaching Level 15 as a Druid, Druidic Spirit Offerings will begin dropping from enemies, which you can turn in at {c_important}{u}Tr Dlra{/u}{/c} to increase your power.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP040: The Barbarian carries an entire {c_important}{u}Arsenal{/u}{/c} consisting of 4 weapons with them at all times. Which weapon you use for a Skill can be chosen while the Skill is assigned to your hotbar.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP041: Upon reaching Level 5 as a Barbarian, you will gain {c_important}{u}Expertise{/u}{/c} with the weapon type you are using.  This grants you bonuses for every attack using that weapon type.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP042: The more a Barbarian uses a particular weapon type, the more benefit they will gain from their {c_important}{u}Expertise{/u}{/c}.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP043: Upon reaching Level 15 as a Barbarian, you will be able to unlock your {c_important}{u}Technique{/u}{/c} slot.  You can gain the {c_important}{u}Expertise{/u}{/c} bonus of a certain weapon type regardless of which weapon type you use if you choose it as your {c_important}{u}Technique{/u}{/c}.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP044: Barbarians have various ways to become {c_important}{u}Berserk{/u}{/c}, which will give you increased damage and movement speed.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP045: The Barbarian's {c_important}{u}Arsenal{/u}{/c} consists of a Two-Handed Bludgeoning weapon, a Two-Handed Slashing weapon, and a Main Hand and Off-Hand pair.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP046: Players and enemies are {c_important}{u}Healthy{/u}{/c} when they are above 80% Life and {c_important}{u}Injured{/u}{/c} when they are below 35% Life.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP047: The first {c_yellow}Capstone Dungeon{/c} becomes available in World Tier 2: Veteran after completing the Campaign.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP048: Lightning-based Sorcerers can generate and pick up {c_important}{u}Crackling Energy{/u}, which periodically damages enemies around them until all charges are depleted.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP049: Damage Over Time effects do not have random damage variance and cannot Critically Strike.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP050: Key Passives are the final unlock in the Skill Tree and provide powerful effects that can greatly enhance your build.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP051: Direct damage includes all damage dealt to enemies that is not from damage over time effects.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP052: {c_important}{u}Close{/u}{/c} enemies are those who are in Melee range.  {c_important}{u}Distant{/u}{/c} enemies are those who are outside of Melee range.

desc: For every 5 Willpower purchased within range, you deal {c_number}+[{GlyphAffixScalar}|1%|]{/c} increased damage to {c_important}{u}Chilled{/u}{/c} targets.

For every 5 Willpower purchased within range, you deal {c_number}+[{GlyphAffixScalar}|1%|]{/c} increased damage while {c_important}{u}Healthy{/u}{/c}.
