Rarespawn_Reward_1HDagger_Scorpion_cappe.name: Broodmother's Stinger

Rarespawn_Reward_1HFocus_Succubus.flavor: Even removed from the demon's body, the eye continues to weave its hypnotic patterns.
Rarespawn_Reward_1HFocus_Succubus.name: Qin's Captivating Eye

Rarespawn_Reward_1HFocus_Succubus_capped.flavor: Even removed from the demon's body, the eye continues to weave its hypnotic patterns.
Rarespawn_Reward_1HFocus_Succubus_capped.name: Qin's Captivating Eye

Rarespawn_Reward_1HMace_BanditMelee.flavor: The handle of this white-hot mace bears soot marks in the shape of a clenched fist.
Rarespawn_Reward_1HMace_BanditMelee.name: Mace of Blazing Furor

Rarespawn_Reward_1HMace_BanditMelee_capp.flavor: The handle of this white-hot mace bears soot marks in the shape of a clenched fist.
Rarespawn_Reward_1HMace_BanditMelee_capp.name: Mace of Blazing Furor

Rarespawn_Reward_1HSword_KnightMelee.flavor:
"While the origins of this accursed blade are lost to time, there is no question that wielding its dark power leaves an indelible stain on one's soul." 
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Rarespawn_Reward_1HSword_KnightMelee.name: Darkblade

Rarespawn_Reward_1HSword_KnightMelee_cap.flavor:
"While the origins of this accursed blade are lost to time, there is no question that wielding its dark power leaves an indelible stain on one's soul." 
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Rarespawn_Reward_1HSword_KnightMelee_cap.name: Darkblade

Rarespawn_Reward_1HWand_Ghost.flavor:
"So skilled was Abe-Mari at divination, they predicted the date of their own death; a skill that proved so ruinous that no mage since has attempted the feat."
- Excerpt from Secrets of the Mage-Clans
Rarespawn_Reward_1HWand_Ghost.name: Wand of Abe-Mari

Rarespawn_Reward_1HWand_Ghost_capped.flavor:
"So skilled was Abe-Mari at divination, they predicted the date of their own death; a skill that proved so ruinous that no mage since has attempted the feat."
- Excerpt from Secrets of the Mage-Clans
Rarespawn_Reward_1HWand_Ghost_capped.name: Wand of Abe-Mari

Rarespawn_Reward_2HSword_MegaDemon.flavor: This massive sword's edge grows keener and its promises of power grow louder with each life taken.
Rarespawn_Reward_2HSword_MegaDemon.name: Infernal Edge

Rarespawn_Reward_2HSword_MegaDemon_cappe.flavor: This massive sword's edge grows keener and its promises of power grow louder with each life taken.
Rarespawn_Reward_2HSword_MegaDemon_cappe.name: Infernal Edge

Rarespawn_Reward_Amulet_DrownedSpecial.flavor:
"Even after he was put to death, some children swore they could still hear his bell ringing softly in the breeze on moonless nights."
- Greenslade's Tales, Chapter 5: "The Myth of Blind Odwyn"
Rarespawn_Reward_Amulet_DrownedSpecial.name: Blind Man's Bell

Rarespawn_Reward_Amulet_DrownedSpecial_c.flavor:
"Even after he was put to death, some children swore they could still hear his bell ringing softly in the breeze on moonless nights."
- Greenslade's Tales, Chapter 5: "The Myth of Blind Odwyn"
Rarespawn_Reward_Amulet_DrownedSpecial_c.name: Blind Man's Bell

Rarespawn_Reward_Amulet_GoatmanMelee.flavor: This vile necklace of charred goat's teeth paradoxically contains both the power to extend life as well as cut it short.
Rarespawn_Reward_Amulet_GoatmanMelee.name: Necklace of Inevitability

Rarespawn_Reward_Amulet_GoatmanMelee_cap.flavor: This vile necklace of charred goat's teeth paradoxically contains both the power to extend life as well as cut it short.
Rarespawn_Reward_Amulet_GoatmanMelee_cap.name: Necklace of Inevitability

Rarespawn_Reward_Amulet_SnakeCaster.flavor:
"A foul spell of desire was woven into the statue's stone. Its idolaters were helpless as their souls were ripped from their bodies to animate its writhing form."
- Field Notes of Brother Darmont
Rarespawn_Reward_Amulet_SnakeCaster.name: Eye of Enkil

Rarespawn_Reward_Amulet_SnakeCaster_capp.flavor:
"A foul spell of desire was woven into the statue's stone. Its idolaters were helpless as their souls were ripped from their bodies to animate its writhing form."
- Field Notes of Brother Darmont
Rarespawn_Reward_Amulet_SnakeCaster_capp.name: Eye of Enkil

Rarespawn_Reward_Boots_SkeletonMelee.flavor:
"The Captain was bleeding from at least three bite wounds, sweating from the poison and barely able to walk, but he never stopped searching for his lost comrades."
- Eulogy for Captain Willcocks
Rarespawn_Reward_Boots_SkeletonMelee.name: Captain's Ragged Boots

Rarespawn_Reward_Boots_SkeletonMelee_cap.flavor:
"The Captain was bleeding from at least three bite wounds, sweating from the poison and barely able to walk, but he never stopped searching for his lost comrades."
- Eulogy for Captain Willcocks
Rarespawn_Reward_Boots_SkeletonMelee_cap.name: Captain's Ragged Boots

Rarespawn_Reward_Chest_CannibalBrute.flavor:
"Favored by Pitiless Gur, this heavy armor remains painfully cold to the touch, even in the hottest of climates."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Rarespawn_Reward_Chest_CannibalBrute.name: Gur's Freezing Armor

Rarespawn_Reward_Chest_CannibalBrute_cap.flavor:
"Favored by Pitiless Gur, this heavy armor remains painfully cold to the touch, even in the hottest of climates."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Rarespawn_Reward_Chest_CannibalBrute_cap.name: Gur's Freezing Armor

Rarespawn_Reward_Crossbow_GhostMelee.flavor:
"Those who came before shall bear witness to your deeds."
- Inscription on the hilt
Rarespawn_Reward_Crossbow_GhostMelee.name: Haunted Crossbow

Rarespawn_Reward_Crossbow_GhostMelee_cap.flavor:
"Those who came before shall bear witness to your deeds."
- Inscription on the hilt
Rarespawn_Reward_Crossbow_GhostMelee_cap.name: Haunted Crossbow

Rarespawn_Reward_Gloves_OmniMonk.flavor: Those foolish few Monks who abuse their training for personal gain are banished from the Floating Sky Monastery and forced to wander the harsh and unforgiving lands beyond.
Rarespawn_Reward_Gloves_OmniMonk.name: Outcast's Handwraps

Rarespawn_Reward_Gloves_OmniMonk_capped.flavor: Those foolish few Monks who abuse their training for personal gain are banished from the Floating Sky Monastery and forced to wander the harsh and unforgiving lands beyond.
Rarespawn_Reward_Gloves_OmniMonk_capped.name: Outcast's Handwraps

Rarespawn_Reward_Helm_BarbarianGhost.flavor:
"There is nothing better in life than to stand alone, painted red, atop a hill made from the bodies of your enemies."
- Zarozar the Mighty
Rarespawn_Reward_Helm_BarbarianGhost.name: Bloodspiller's Helm

Rarespawn_Reward_Helm_BarbarianGhost_cap.flavor:
"There is nothing better in life than to stand alone, painted red, atop a hill made from the bodies of your enemies."
- Zarozar the Mighty
Rarespawn_Reward_Helm_BarbarianGhost_cap.name: Bloodspiller's Helm

Rarespawn_Reward_Pants_WerewolfMelee.flavor: Wearing these gore-drenched leggings fills your mind with a single overwhelming desire: to hunt.
Rarespawn_Reward_Pants_WerewolfMelee.name: Manhunter's Breeches

Rarespawn_Reward_Pants_WerewolfMelee_cap.flavor: Wearing these gore-drenched leggings fills your mind with a single overwhelming desire: to hunt.
Rarespawn_Reward_Pants_WerewolfMelee_cap.name: Manhunter's Breeches

Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_BloodLord.flavor:
"Unhand me, filth! A single drop of my blood is worth an ocean of yours! Within it churns a power you could never hope to understand!"
- Lord Enan, last words
Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_BloodLord.name: Blood-Cursed Band

Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_BloodLord_capped.flavor:
"Unhand me, filth! A single drop of my blood is worth an ocean of yours! Within it churns a power you could never hope to understand!"
- Lord Enan, last words
Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_BloodLord_capped.name: Blood-Cursed Band

Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_FlyHost.flavor:
"Dearest Will, this ring is like my love for you. Both have no end. May this ring keep you safe and help keep me in your heart during your travels. - Lucya"
- Inscription on the band
Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_FlyHost.name: Trembling Ring

Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_FlyHost_capped.flavor:
"Dearest Will, this ring is like my love for you. Both have no end. May this ring keep you safe and help keep me in your heart during your travels. - Lucya"
- Inscription on the band
Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_FlyHost_capped.name: Trembling Ring

Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_WoodWraith.flavor: Even the slightest touch leaves painful splinters burrowed in the flesh.
Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_WoodWraith.name: Ring of Splintered Wood

Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_WoodWraith_capped.flavor: Even the slightest touch leaves painful splinters burrowed in the flesh.
Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_WoodWraith_capped.name: Ring of Splintered Wood

Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_ZombieBrute.flavor: A malformed collection of bone, flesh and a strange, hardened ichor, this ring-shaped object almost seems to have been grown, rather than crafted.
Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_ZombieBrute.name: Grotesque Loop

Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_ZombieBrute_capped.flavor: A malformed collection of bone, flesh and a strange, hardened ichor, this ring-shaped object almost seems to have been grown, rather than crafted.
Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_ZombieBrute_capped.name: Grotesque Loop

Rarespawn_Reward_Staff_CultistCaster.flavor: A powerful relic once belonging to Jazreth the Summoner, this staff was thought lost forever.
Rarespawn_Reward_Staff_CultistCaster.name: Staff of Elemental Command

Rarespawn_Reward_Staff_CultistCaster_cap.flavor: A powerful relic once belonging to Jazreth the Summoner, this staff was thought lost forever.
Rarespawn_Reward_Staff_CultistCaster_cap.name: Staff of Elemental Command

1HAxe_Unique_Generic_001.desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} When you Critically Strike an enemy you have up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} chance to Fear and Slow them by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds.
1HAxe_Unique_Generic_001.flavor: A nightmarish amalgam of blood, bone and steel, this axe is as horrific, and as deadly, as its creator.
1HAxe_Unique_Generic_001.name: The Butcher's Cleaver

1HSword_Unique_Generic_001.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to deal {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Shadow damage to surrounding enemies and reduce their damage done by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds.
1HSword_Unique_Generic_001.flavor: Whenever this ancient sword has reappeared throughout history, it portends a time of great strife, as well as a devastating loss of life.
1HSword_Unique_Generic_001.name: Doombringer

2HSword_Unique_Generic_001.desc:
Increases your Critical Strike Damage by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c}. 

The other properties on this weapon can roll higher than normal.
2HSword_Unique_Generic_001.flavor: An unbroken lineage of unwavering strength.
2HSword_Unique_Generic_001.name: The Grandfather

Amulet_Unique_Generic_100.desc: Gain {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|~%|]{/c} Maximum Resource. In addition, when you take damage, drain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} Resource for every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"|%|]{/c} of Life you would have lost instead.
Amulet_Unique_Generic_100.flavor:
"Do not allow your passions to become obsessions. Fuel the fire that burns within you, but it is madness to allow yourself to become ash to please an uncaring universe."
- Last words of Master Selig
Amulet_Unique_Generic_100.name: Melted Heart of Selig

Boots_Unique_Generic_001.desc: You leave behind a trail of frost that {c_important}{u}Chills{/u}{/c} enemies. You deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} more damage to {c_important}{u}Chilled{/u}{/c} enemies.
Boots_Unique_Generic_001.flavor: Remorseful devotees of the Cathedral of Light must undertake a grueling pilgrimage, journeying across the frigid glacier known as the Serac Rapture. Only then may their gravest sins be forgiven.
Boots_Unique_Generic_001.name: Penitent Greaves

Chest_Unique_Generic_100.flavor: Crafted by the cannibal Armoda, each piece of this interlocking armor has been sharpened into a knife's edge. Even a century after death, the plate remained on her corpse, unable to be removed safely.
Chest_Unique_Generic_100.name: Razorplate

Gloves_Unique_Generic_002.desc: Your attacks randomly deal {c_number}[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of their normal damage.
Gloves_Unique_Generic_002.flavor:
"Will you let fear cheat you, or will you risk everything to find understanding? After all, death is simply the coin with which we purchase life."
- Zurke
Gloves_Unique_Generic_002.name: Fists of Fate

Gloves_Unique_Generic_003.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to {c_important}{u}Freeze{/u}{/c} enemies for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
Gloves_Unique_Generic_003.flavor: A touch so frigid it stops the heart and chills the very soul.
Gloves_Unique_Generic_003.name: Frostburn

Helm_Unique_Generic_001.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to trigger a poison nova that applies {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Poisoning damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds to enemies in the area.
Helm_Unique_Generic_001.flavor: The horrific whispers of the Maiden of Anguish flicker through your mind, pushing you ever closer to madness...
Helm_Unique_Generic_001.name: Andariel's Visage

Helm_Unique_Generic_002.desc:
Gain {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} Damage Reduction. 
In addition, gain {c_number}+[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Ranks to all Skills.
Helm_Unique_Generic_002.flavor:
"This headdress was once worn by an assassin disguised as a court mage. Her treachery was unveiled, but not before she used its magic to curse the king's entire lineage."
- The Fall of House Aston
Helm_Unique_Generic_002.name: Harlequin Crest

Pants_Unique_Generic_100.desc: Effects that Heal you beyond {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} Life grant you a {c_important}{u}Barrier{/u}{/c} up to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life that lasts for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds.
Pants_Unique_Generic_100.flavor:
"The revelation that master tailor Callas was in fact a witch only served to further fuel the desire for her uniquely enchanted legwraps."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Pants_Unique_Generic_100.name: Temerity

Ring_Unique_Generic_100.desc: If a {c_important}Core{/c} Skill hits {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} or more enemies, {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of the Resource cost is refunded.
Ring_Unique_Generic_100.flavor:
"Every tome, every scroll, every book in this temple produces the same answer. The only being willing to stand against the Eternal Conflict, against the Prime Evils, was Lilith."
- Elias
Ring_Unique_Generic_100.name: Mother's Embrace

Ring_Unique_Generic_101.desc: Each consecutive {c_important}Core{/c} Skill cast reduces the Resource cost of your next {c_important}Core{/c} Skill by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}, up to a maximum of {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c}.
Ring_Unique_Generic_101.flavor:
"Yours is the power to pluck the stars from the heavens with the ease of a child gathering fruit from the bough."
- Unknown
Ring_Unique_Generic_101.name: Ring of Starless Skies

Necromancer_Golem_Blood_Passive_Sacrific.desc: Your Maximum Life is increased by {c_number}[{SF_1}|%x|]{/c}, but you lose the ability to summon a Golem.
Necromancer_Golem_Blood_Passive_Sacrific.name: Sacrifice

Necromancer_Golem_Blood_Passive_UpgradeA.desc: Your Blood Golem absorbs {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} of damage you would take.
Necromancer_Golem_Blood_Passive_UpgradeA.name: Upgrade A

Necromancer_Golem_Blood_Passive_UpgradeB.desc: While {c_important}Healthy{/c}, your Blood Golem gains {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} Damage Reduction and {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage.
Necromancer_Golem_Blood_Passive_UpgradeB.name: Upgrade B

Necromancer_Golem_Bone_Passive_Sacrifice.desc: You gain {c_number}[{SF_1}|%+|]{/c} increased Attack Speed, but you lose the ability to summon a Golem.
Necromancer_Golem_Bone_Passive_Sacrifice.name: Sacrifice

Necromancer_Golem_Bone_Passive_UpgradeA.desc: Each time your Bone Golem takes up to {c_number}{SF_1}%{/c} of its Maximum Life as damage, it sheds a Corpse.
Necromancer_Golem_Bone_Passive_UpgradeA.name: Upgrade A

Necromancer_Golem_Bone_Passive_UpgradeB.desc: Your Bone Golem gains {c_number}[{SF_2}|%|]{/c} Maximum Life and the amount of Thorns they inherit from you is increased from {c_number}[{SF_5}|%|]{/c} to {c_number}[{SF_3}+{SF_5}|%|]{/c}.
Necromancer_Golem_Bone_Passive_UpgradeB.name: Upgrade B

Necromancer_Golem_Iron_Passive_Sacrifice.desc: You deal {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%x|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Damage, but you lose the ability to summon a Golem.
Necromancer_Golem_Iron_Passive_Sacrifice.name: Sacrifice

Necromancer_Golem_Iron_Passive_UpgradeA.desc: Every {c_number}5th{/c} Iron Golem attack causes a shockwave, dealing {c_number}{payload:TOOLTIP_CONE_PAYLOAD}{/c} damage to the primary enemy and to enemies behind them.
Necromancer_Golem_Iron_Passive_UpgradeA.name: Upgrade A

Necromancer_Golem_Iron_Passive_UpgradeB.desc: Your Iron Golem's slam attack also makes enemies Vulnerable for {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds.
Necromancer_Golem_Iron_Passive_UpgradeB.name: Upgrade B

Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Cold_Passive_Sa.desc: You deal {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage to Vulnerable enemies, but you can no longer raise Skeletal Mages.
Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Cold_Passive_Sa.name: Sacrifice

Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Cold_Passive_Up.desc: Each time your Cold Mages damage enemies with their primary attack, you gain {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} Essence.
Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Cold_Passive_Up.name: Upgrade A

Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Cold_Passive_Up.desc: Enemies who are Frozen by or damaged while Frozen by your Cold Mages' primary attack are made Vulnerable for {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds.
Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Cold_Passive_Up.name: Upgrade B

Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Sacrifice_Passi.desc: Your Overpower damage is increased by {c_number}[{SF_1}|%x|]{/c}, but you can no longer raise Skeletal Mages.
Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Sacrifice_Passi.name: Sacrifice

Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Sacrifice_Passi.desc: Reduce the Life cost of your Bone Mages' attacks from {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} to {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c}. After being alive for {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds, Bone Mages deal {c_number}[{SF_3}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage.
Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Sacrifice_Passi.name: Upgrade A

Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Sacrifice_Passi.desc: Each time a Bone Mage dies from its own attack, they leave behind a Corpse and {c_important}Fortify{/c} you for {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} of your Base Life {c_number}([Max(1,{fortified:FORTIFY})|0|]){/c}.
Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Sacrifice_Passi.name: Upgrade B

Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Shadow_Passive_.desc: Your maximum Essence is increased by {c_number}{SF_0}{/c}, but you can no longer raise Skeletal Mages.
Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Shadow_Passive_.name: Sacrifice

Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Shadow_Passive_.desc: Shadow Mage attacks have a {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%|]{/c} chance to Stun for {c_number}{buffduration:STUN}{/c} seconds. This cannot happen on the same enemy more than once every {c_number}{buffduration:STUN_COOLDOWN}{/c} seconds.
Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Shadow_Passive_.name: Upgrade A

Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Shadow_Passive_.desc: Shadow Mages fire an additional shadow bolt every {c_number}{SF_0}th{/c} attack.
Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Shadow_Passive_.name: Upgrade B

Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Defender_Pas.desc: You gain {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} Non-Physical Resistance, but you can no longer raise Skeletal Warriors.
Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Defender_Pas.name: Sacrifice

Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Defender_Pas.desc: Every {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds your Skeletal Defenders negate the next instance of Direct Damage they would take.
Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Defender_Pas.name: Upgrade A

Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Defender_Pas.desc: Increase the amount of Thorns that Defender Warriors inherit from you from {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100}|%|]{/c} to {c_number}[{SF_1} * 100}|%|]{/c}.
Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Defender_Pas.name: Upgrade B

Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Reaper_Passi.desc: You deal {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%x|]{/c} increased Shadow Damage, but you can no longer raise Skeletal Warriors.
Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Reaper_Passi.name: Sacrifice

Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Reaper_Passi.desc: Reaper attacks against enemies who are Immobilized, Slowed, Stunned, or Vulnerable reduce the cooldown of their powerful wind-up attack by {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds.
Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Reaper_Passi.name: Upgrade A

Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Reaper_Passi.desc: Reapers have a {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%|]{/c} chance to carve the flesh off enemies, forming a Corpse.
Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Reaper_Passi.name: Upgrade B

Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Skirmisher_P.desc: Your Critical Strike Chance is increased by {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%+|]{/c}, but you can no longer raise Skeletal Warriors.
Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Skirmisher_P.name: Sacrifice

Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Skirmisher_P.desc: You can raise one additional Skirmisher Warrior.
Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Skirmisher_P.name: Upgrade A

Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Skirmisher_P.desc: Each time you Critically Strike, your Skirmishers Warriors' next attack Critically Strikes and deals {c_number}[{SF_1} * 100|%x|]{/c} bonus Critical Strike damage. Can only happen every {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds.
Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Skirmisher_P.name: Upgrade B

Legendary_Necro_121.desc:
{c_important}Bone Storm{/c} and {c_important}Blood Wave{/c} are also {c_important}Darkness{/c} Skills, deal Shadow damage, and gain additional effects: 
{icon:bullet,1.2} Enemies damaged by {c_important}Bone Storm{/c} take {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Shadow damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds. 
{icon:bullet,1.2} {c_important}Blood Wave{/c} desecrates the ground it travels over, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1*Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Shadow damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 2"]{/c} seconds
Legendary_Necro_121.name: of Ultimate Shadow

Legendary_Necro_122.desc: {c_important}Blood Mist{/c} triggers {c_important}Corpse Explosion{/c} on surrounding Corpses. When {c_important}Blood Mist{/c} detonates a Corpse, its Cooldown is reduced by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds.
Legendary_Necro_122.name: of Explosive Mist

legendary_necro_002.desc: Each time one of your {c_important}Summoning{/c} Minions damages an enemy, they gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%+|]{/c} Attack Speed for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds, up to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*Affix."Static Value 1"|%+|]{/c}.
legendary_necro_002.name: of Frenzied Dead

legendary_necro_012.desc: {c_important}Bone Spear's{/c} primary attack makes enemies hit beyond the first {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds. Bone Shards from {c_important}Bone Spear{/c} deal {c_random}[(Affix."Static Value 0" * (Affix_Value_1 - 1.5)) + 50|%|]{/c} bonus damage to {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} enemies and pierce them.
legendary_necro_012.name: Splintering

legendary_necro_016.desc: {c_important}Bone Prison{/c} spawns a pool of {c_important}Blight{/c} that deals {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} bonus damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_necro_016.name: of Plunging Darkness

legendary_necro_017.desc: {c_important}Blight's{/c} defiled area, when spawned, Pulls in enemies around the affected area.
legendary_necro_017.name: of the Void

legendary_necro_020.desc: {c_important}Decompose{/c} can chain up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} additional targets. When {c_important}Decompose{/c} spawns a Corpse, it has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to spawn a Corpse under all afflicted targets.
legendary_necro_020.name: Rotting

legendary_necro_022.desc: Critical Strikes from {c_important}Sever{/c} have a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to spawn a pool of {c_important}Blight{/c} under the target that deals {c_random}[((Affix_Value_1 - 10) * Affix."Static Value 0") + Affix."Static Value 1"|%|]{/c} bonus damage. This effect can only happen once every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 2"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_necro_022.name: of Empowering Reaper

legendary_necro_023.desc: Every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds, your Cold Skeletal Mages cast a blizzard that deals {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Cold damage and continuously {c_important}{u}Chills{/u}{/c} enemies for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 2"/Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_necro_023.name: Coldbringer's

legendary_necro_028.desc: {c_important}Blood Lance{/c} deals {c_number}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage to its primary target per lanced enemy.
legendary_necro_028.name: Blood Seeker's

legendary_necro_029.desc: When {c_important}Blood Lance{/c} hits an enemy that is already lanced, it has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to fire a {c_important}Blood Lance{/c} at a Nearby enemy.
legendary_necro_029.name: of Hungry Blood

legendary_necro_031.desc: Your maximum number of Skeletal Mages is increased by {c_number}[Affix_Value_1]{/c}.
legendary_necro_031.name: Viscous

legendary_necro_032.desc: {c_important}Blood Mist{/c} leaves a trail that lasts for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds and deals {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Shadow damage per second to enemies who stand in it. Your Movement Speed is no longer reduced while {c_important}Blood Mist{/c} is active.
legendary_necro_032.name: Blood-soaked

legendary_necro_036.desc: {c_important}Bone Spirit{/c} deals increased damage based on distance traveled, up to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c}.
legendary_necro_036.name: of Swelling Curse

legendary_necro_038.desc: When a segment of {c_important}Bone Prison{/c} is destroyed or expires, it deals {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage in an area around itself.
legendary_necro_038.name: of Bursting Bones

legendary_necro_053.desc: While {c_important}Army of the Dead{/c} is active, your Minions gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%+|]{/c} Attack Speed and take {c_number}[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} reduced damage.
legendary_necro_053.name: Unyielding Commander's

legendary_necro_054.desc: Each time that {c_important}Bone Storm{/c} damages an enemy, gain a {c_important}{u}Barrier{/u}{/c} equal to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of your Base Life for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_necro_054.name: of Shielding Storm

legendary_necro_066.desc: Gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%+|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Chance for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds when you cast {c_important}Corpse Tendrils{/c}. You deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 0"|%x|]{/c} bonus Critical Strike Damage to enemies damaged by {c_important}Corpse Tendrils{/c}.
legendary_necro_066.name: of Grasping Veins

legendary_necro_067.desc: Your maximum number of Skeletal Warriors is increased by {c_number}[Affix_Value_1]{/c}.
legendary_necro_067.name: Blood Getter's

legendary_necro_100.desc: Critical Strikes with {c_important}Bone{/c} Skills increase your Essence Regeneration by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Affix Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_necro_100.name: of Torment

legendary_necro_101.desc: The {c_important}Ossified Essence{/c} Key Passive also increases the Critical Strike Damage of your {c_important}Bone{/c} Skills by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%+|]{/c} per Essence above {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c}, up to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%+|]{/c}.
legendary_necro_101.name: of Serration

legendary_necro_102.desc: {c_important}Bone Storm{/c} consumes up to {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} Corpses to increase its duration by up to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*Affix_Value_2|1|]{/c} seconds.
legendary_necro_102.name: Osseous Gale

legendary_necro_103.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} chance to generate {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} Essence when hitting a {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} enemy with your {c_important}Bone{/c} Skills.
legendary_necro_103.name: of Exposed Flesh

legendary_necro_104.desc: You deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds after the {c_important}Shadowblight{/c} Key Passive damages enemies {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} times.
legendary_necro_104.name: Blighted

legendary_necro_105.desc: Enemies afflicted by your {c_important}Iron Maiden{/c} have a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to be Stunned for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} second when they deal direct damage.
legendary_necro_105.name: Torturous

legendary_necro_106.desc: You deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased Shadow Damage to enemies afflicted by both {c_important}Decrepify{/c} and {c_important}Iron Maiden{/c}.
legendary_necro_106.name: of the Damned

legendary_necro_107.desc: Each time the {c_important}Shadowblight{/c} Key Passive deals damage to enemies, it increases the next {c_important}Shadowblight's{/c} damage within {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c}, stacking up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} times.
legendary_necro_107.name: of Decay

legendary_necro_108.desc: {c_important}Blood Surge's{/c} nova echoes again after a short delay, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} less damage.
legendary_necro_108.name: Blood-bathed

legendary_necro_109.desc: {c_important}Blood Wave{/c} fires two additional waves, each dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} less damage than the previous.
legendary_necro_109.name: Tidal

legendary_necro_110.desc: {c_important}{u}Blood Orbs{/u}{/c} reduce your {c_important}Ultimate{/c} Cooldown by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds.
legendary_necro_110.name: Fastblood

legendary_necro_111.desc: Whenever your {c_important}Blood{/c} Skills {c_important}{u}Overpower{/u}{/c} you gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%+|]{/c} Attack Speed for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"] seconds.
legendary_necro_111.name: of Rathma's Chosen

legendary_necro_112.desc: Each percent of your Maximum Life you Heal beyond {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} grants you {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1" * 100|1%+|]{/c} bonus {c_important}{u}Overpower{/u}{/c} damage on your next {c_important}{u}Overpowering{/u}{/c} attack, up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} bonus.
legendary_necro_112.name: of Untimely Death

legendary_necro_113.desc: While at full Life, {c_important}{u}Blood Orbs{/u}{/c} grant {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} Essence.
legendary_necro_113.name: of Potent Blood

legendary_necro_114.desc: Your {c_important}Golem{/c} has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to reduce its active Cooldown by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds and a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1 / 2|%|]{/c} chance to spawn a Corpse each time it damages an enemy with its normal attack.
legendary_necro_114.name: Hulking

legendary_necro_115.desc: While you have {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} or more Minions, your Minions gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased Damage Reduction.
legendary_necro_115.name: of Hardened Bones

legendary_necro_117.desc: You gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} Maximum Essence per active Minion.
legendary_necro_117.name: Requiem

legendary_necro_118.desc: Your {c_important}Skeletons{/c} gain increased damage while alive, up to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} after {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_necro_118.name: of Reanimation

legendary_necro_119.desc: Consuming a {c_important}Corpse{/c} increases the damage of your next {c_important}Core{/c} Skill by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c}, up to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 0"|%x|]{/c}.
legendary_necro_119.name: Cadaverous

legendary_necro_120.desc: Consuming a {c_important}Corpse{/c} has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to spawn a {c_important}{u}Blood Orb{/u}{/c}.
legendary_necro_120.name: of the Embalmer

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_001.desc: Your Minions deal {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage for each Minion type you have active. This only applies to the Minion types: Skeletal Warrior, Skeletal Mage, and Golem.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_002.desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Your Minions have a {c_number}{SF_0}%{/c} chance to grant you a {c_important}{u}Barrier{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life for {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_003.desc: When your Minions die, they explode and deal {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} of their Maximum Life as Shadow damage to surrounding enemies.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_004.desc: Your Minions have {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} less Maximum Life but deal {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_005.desc: Your Golem has {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c} increased Maximum Life and deals {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_006.desc: Consuming a Corpse Slows enemies around it by {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} for {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} seconds. Your {c_important}Corpse{/c} Skills deal {c_number}[{SF_3}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage to Crowd Controlled enemies.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_007.desc: With at least {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} Corpses Nearby, you gain {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} Damage Reduction. With no Corpses Nearby, you deal {c_number}[{SF_4}*100|x%|]{/c} increased damage.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_008.desc: Consuming {c_number}[SF_1]{/c} Corpses grants {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage for {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_009.desc: When your Minion is killed, it has a {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} chance to leave a Corpse.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_010.desc: Attacks that are guaranteed to {c_important}{u}Overpower{/u}{/c} deal {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c} increased {c_important}{u}Overpower{/u}{/c} damage.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_011.desc: {c_important}{u}Blood Orbs{/u}{/c} grant {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage, up to {c_number}[{SF_0}*100*{SF_1}|%x|]{/c}, for {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_012.desc: {c_important}{u}Blood Orbs{/u}{/c} also restore {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} Essence when picked up.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_013.desc: {c_important}Bone{/c} Skills grant you {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} damage reduction, up to {c_number}[{SF_0}*100*{SF_1}|%|]{/c}, for the next {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_014.desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Your {c_important}Bone{/c} Skills have a {c_number}{SF_0}%{/c} chance to make enemies {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}2{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_015.desc: Whenever you consume a Corpse, a {c_important}Bone Spirit{/c} is spawned at its location.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_016.desc: Your Shadow damage over time effects have a {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c} chance to deal {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%x|]{/c} bonus damage each time they deal damage. This chance is increased by {c_number}[{SF_2}*100|%x|]{/c} and bonus damage is increased by {c_number}[{SF_3}*100|1%x|]{/c} for each {c_number}[{SF_4}]{/c} Willpower you have.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_017.desc: Hitting enemies with {c_important}Bone{/c} Skills increases your damage by {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c} and your Maximum Essence by {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_3}{/c} seconds, stacks up to {c_number}[{SF_0}*{SF_2}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage and {c_number}[{SF_1}*{SF_2}]{/c} Maximum Essence.

power.skill_desc: You and your Minions deal {c_number}[{SF_12} * 100|%x|]{/c} increased damage to enemies who are being {c_important}Decomposed{/c}.
If an enemy dies while being {c_important}Decomposed{/c}, you gain {c_number}{SF_7}{/c} Essence.
If an enemy hit by {c_important}Reap{/c} dies within {c_number}{SF_4}{/c} seconds, you gain {c_number}[{SF_5} * 100|%+|]{/c} Attack Speed for {c_number}{SF_15}{/c} seconds.

After picking up a {c_important}{u}Blood Orb{/u}{/c}, your next {c_important}Hemorrhage{/c} also deals damage to enemies around your target and grants {c_number}{SF_10}{/c} additional Essence per enemy hit.
{c_important}Bone Splinters{/c} has a {c_number}[{SF_10} * 100|%|]{/c} chance to fire {c_number}{SF_8}{/c} additional projectiles if cast while you have {c_number}{SF_15}{/c} or more Essence.
{c_important}Blight{/c} Slows enemies by {c_number}[{SF_15}*100|%|]{/c}.
{c_important}Sever{/c} damages enemies along its path for {c_number}[{SF_16} * 100|%|]{/c} of its initial damage.

{c_important}Blood Surge{/c} Heals you for {c_number}[{SF_12}*100|1%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life {c_number}([PlayerHealthMax() * SF_12]){/c} when drawing blood from enemies. If {c_number}{SF_11}{/c} or more enemies are drawn from, then Heal for an additional {c_number}[{SF_12}*100|1%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life {c_number}([PlayerHealthMax() * SF_12]){/c}.
{c_important}Blood Lance{/c} pierces through enemies who are currently lanced, dealing {c_number}[{SF_14} * 100|%|]{/c} reduced damage to subsequent enemies after the first.
{c_important}Bone Spear{/c} breaks into {c_number}{SF_6}{/c} shards when it is destroyed, dealing {c_number}{payload:BONE_SHARD}{/c} damage each.
{c_important}Corpse Explosion's{/c} radius is increased by {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c}.
{c_important}Blood Mist{/c} {c_important}{u}Fortifies{/u}{/c} you for {c_number}[{SF_9}*100|1%|]{/c} Base Life {c_number}([Max(1,{fortified:FORTIFY_HEALTH})|0|]){/c} each time it hits an enemy.
Casting a Skill that {c_important}{u}Overpowers{/u}{/c} reduces the cooldown of {c_important}Blood Mist{/c} by {c_number}[{SF_13}]{/c} seconds.
If an enemy is trapped by {c_important}Bone Prison{/c}, gain {c_number}{SF_3}{/c} Essence, plus an additional {c_number}{SF_6}{/c} per enemy trapped.

{c_important}Iron Maiden{/c} no longer costs Essence. Instead, gain {c_number}{SF_6}{/c} Essence for each enemy Cursed. Does not work with enemies who are already Cursed with {c_important}Iron Maiden{/c}.
{c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Enemies hit while afflicted with {c_important}Decrepify{/c} have up to a {c_number}[{SF_5}*100|%|]{/c} chance to Stun them for {c_number}{buffduration:MOD_STUN}{/c} seconds.
Enemies who are in range of {c_important}Corpse Tendrils{/c} are Slowed by {c_number}[{SF_10}*100|%|]{/c} before being Pulled.
If {c_important}Bone Spirit{/c} Critically Strikes, its Cooldown is reduced by {c_number}{SF_15}{/c} seconds. This effect can only happen once per cast.
{c_important}Blight{/c} has a {c_number}[{SF_16}*100|%|]{/c} chance to Immobilize enemies for {c_number}{buffduration:IMMOBILIZE}{/c} seconds on impact.
{c_important}Sever{/c} deals {c_number}[{SF_13} * 100|%x|]{/c} increased damage for each Minion you have upon cast.

Each time an enemy is hit by {c_important}Blood Surge's{/c} nova, you are {c_important}{u}Fortified{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[{SF_14}*100|%|]{/c} Base Life {c_number}([Max(1,{fortified:FORTIFY_HEALTH})|0|]){/c}. While you have {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c} for over {c_number}[{SF_24}*100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life, {c_important}Blood Surge{/c} deals {c_number}[{SF_25}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage.
{c_important}Bone Spear{/c} makes the first enemy hit {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_19}{/c} seconds.

Unearth a prison of bone with {c_number}{pet_health:BoneWall}{/c} Life that surrounds the target area for {c_number}{buffduration:WALL_TRACKER}{/c} seconds.
