Shadow Damage infects enemies with {c_important}Shadowblight{/c} for {c_number}{buffduration:DEBUFF_SHADOWBLIGHT_COUNTER}{/c} seconds. You and your minions deal {c_number}[{SF_4}*100|%x|]{/c} bonus damage to enemies with {c_important}Shadowblight{/c}.

Every {c_number}{SF_2}th{/c} time an enemy receives Shadow Damage from you or your Minions while they are affected by {c_important}Shadowblight{/c}, they take additional  {c_number}{payload:BURST_DAMAGE}{/c} Shadow Damage.
Every {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} Essence you spend reduces the cooldowns of your {c_important}Bone{/c} Skills by {c_number}[{SF_0}|1|]{/c} seconds.
While {c_important}{u}Healthy{/u}{/c} your Blood Skills deal {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%x|]{/c} increased damage.
Every {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} seconds, your Skeletal Priest's Healing will Heal your skeletons for {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%|]{/c} of their Maximum Life.
Your {c_important}Bone{/c} Skills deal {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%x|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Damage to {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} enemies.

Hitting the same enemy at least {c_number}{SF_20}{/c} times with the same cast of {c_important}Bone Splinters{/c} grants {c_number}[{SF_21} * 100|%+|]{/c} Critical Strike Chance for {c_number}{SF_22}{/c} seconds.
Consuming a Corpse generates {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} Essence.

{c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Your damage has up to a {c_number}{SF_0}%{/c} chance to create a Corpse at the target's location. 

This chance is doubled against Bosses.
When a Corpse is formed from your Skills or your Minions, {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} Base Life {c_number}([Max(1,{fortified:PAYLOAD_FORTIFY})|0|]){/c}.
After you have been {c_important}{u}Healthy{/u}{/c} for at least {c_number}{buffduration:BUFF_HEALTHY_CHECK}{/c} seconds, you and your Minions gain {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%+|]{/c} Attack Speed.
Sacrificing both Skeletal Warriors and Skeletal Mages increases their Sacrifice bonuses by {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%|]{/c}.

{c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Hitting enemies with {c_important}Blood{/c} Skills has up to a {c_number}{SF_1}%{/c} chance to {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c} you for {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} Base Life {c_number}([Max(1,{fortified:FORTIFY_CASTER})|0|]){/c}.
Your {c_important}Blood{/c} Skills deal {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c} increased {c_important}{u}Overpower{/u}{/c} damage. This bonus is doubled while you are {c_important}{u}Healthy{/u}{/c}.

Increase your Maximum Life by {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|x%|]{/c}. After being {c_important}{u}Healthy{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_3}{/c} seconds, your next {c_important}Blood{/c} Skill {c_important}{u}Overpowers{/u}{/c}.

After you have not taken damage in the last {c_number}{SF_6}{/c} seconds, your Minions gain {c_number}[{SF_1} * 100|%+|]{/c} Attack Speed. While you have at least {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} Minions, this bonus is doubled.
Your Minions deal {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%x|]{/c} increased damage while you are Close to them.
{c_important}Blood Wave{/c} leaves behind {c_number}3{/c} {c_important}{u}Blood Orbs{/u}{/c} as it travels.
Your Critical Strike Chance is increased by {c_number}[{SF_12}*100|+%|]{/c} while {c_important}Bone Storm{/c} is active.
{c_important}Army of the Dead{/c} also raises your Skeletal Warriors and Skeletal Mages.

{c_label}Essence Cost: {/c}{c_resource}{Resource Cost}{/c}
Curse the target area. Enemies afflicted by {c_important}Decrepify{/c} are Slowed by {c_number}[{SF_3}*100|1%|]{/c} and deal {c_number}[{SF_4}*100|1%|]{/c} less damage for {c_number}{buffduration:DECREPIFY_CURSE}{/c} seconds.

{c_important}Reap{/c} instantly kills targets below {c_number}[{SF_7}*100|%|]{/c} Life.

This does not work on bosses or players.
{c_important}Bone Splinters{/c} has a {c_number}[{SF_12} * 100|%|]{/c} chance per hit to make enemies {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_13}{/c} seconds.
{c_important}Hemorrhage{/c} gains an additional {c_number}[{SF_11} * 100|%+|]{/c} Attack Speed while {c_important}{u}Healthy{/u}{/c}.

{c_important}Hemorrhage{/c} grants {c_number}[{SF_12}*100|1%|]{/c} Base Life {c_number}([Max(1,{fortified:MOD_FORTIFY})|0|]){/c} as {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c} each time it hits an enemy, and has a {c_number}[{SF_13} * 100|1%|]{/c} chance per enemy hit to {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c} you for {c_number}[100|%|]{/c} Base Life {c_number}([Max(1,{fortified:MOD_FULL_FORTIFY})|0|]){/c}.
{c_important}Decompose{/c} Slows enemies by {c_number}[{SF_13} * 100|%|]{/c}.
{c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Enemies hit while afflicted with {c_important}Decrepify{/c} have up to a {c_number}[{SF_7}*100|%|]{/c} chance to reduce your active Cooldowns by {c_number}[{SF_8}]{/c} second.
Every {c_number}4th{/c} cast of {c_important}Sever{/c} makes enemies {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[{SF_14}]{/c} seconds.

If an enemy is damaged by {c_important}Blood Surge's{/c} nova while you are {c_important}{u}Healthy{/u}{/c}, then gain {c_number}1{/c} stack of Overwhelming Blood. When you have {c_number}5{/c} stacks of Overwhelming Blood, your next {c_important}Blood Surge{/c} {c_important}{u}Overpowers{/u}{/c}.

After casting {c_important}Blood Lance{/c} {c_number}{SF_10}{/c} times, your next cast of {c_important}Blood Lance{/c} is guaranteed to {c_important}{u}Overpower{/u}{/c} and spawns a {c_important}{u}Blood Orb{/u}{/c} under the first enemy hit.
{c_important}Blood Mist{/c} leaves behind a Corpse every {c_number}{SF_10}{/c} second.
After {c_important}Bone Spirit{/c} hits an enemy, you generate {c_number}{SF_17}{/c} Essence over the next {c_number}{buffduration:MANA_REGEN}{/c} seconds.
{c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[{SF_7}*100|%|]{/c} Base Life {c_number}([Max(1,{fortified:MODB_FORTIFY})|0|]){/c} for each enemy trapped by {c_important}Bone Prison{/c}.
{c_important}Corpse Tendrils{/c} has a {c_number}[{SF_9} * 100|%|]{/c} chance when damaging enemies to drop a {c_important}{u}Blood Orb{/u}{/c}.
Enemies damaged by {c_important}Corpse Tendrils{/c} are made {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[{SF_11}]{/c} seconds.
When at least {c_number}{SF_8}{/c} enemies are afflicted by {c_important}Iron Maiden{/c}, its damage is increased by {c_number}[{SF_9}*100|%x|]{/c}.

{c_important}Corpse Explosion{/c} becomes a {c_important}Darkness{/c} Skill and, instead of exploding, releases a vile miasma dealing {c_number}{dot:MIASMA_DOT_TOOLTIP}{/c} Shadow Damage over {c_number}{SF_12}{/c} seconds.
Increase the damage and Life of your Skeletal Warriors by {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%x|]{/c} .
Increase the damage and Life of your Skeletal Mages by {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%x|]{/c} .
Increase the damage and Life of your Golem by {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%x|]{/c} .

{c_important}Bone Spear{/c} has a {c_number}[{SF_10}*100|%+|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Chance. If {c_important}Bone Spear's{/c} primary projectile Critically Strikes, it fires {c_number}{SF_7}{/c} additional bone shards upon being destroyed.
{c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} {c_important}Darkness{/c} Skills have up to a {c_number}{SF_1}%{/c} chance to Stun for {c_number}{buffduration:STUN}{/c} seconds.
Your Minions cannot lose more than {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} of their Maximum Life from a single damage instance.
You deal {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%x|]{/c} increased damage for {c_number}{buffduration:DAMAGE_BONUS}{/c} seconds after consuming a Corpse.
While below {c_number}50%{/c} Life, you receive {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%+|]{/c} more Healing from all sources.
You and your Minions deal {c_number}[{SF_18}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage to enemies within {c_important}Blight{/c}.
Your maximum Essence is increased by {c_number}{SF_0}{/c}.
You deal {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%x|]{/c} increased damage to Distant enemies.
Close enemies take {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%x|]{/c} more damage from you and deal {c_number}[{SF_1} * 100|%|]{/c} less damage to you.
power.skill_rankup_desc:
{icon:bullet,1.2} Bonus Close Damage {icon:arrow,1.2} {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%x|]{/c}
{icon:bullet,1.2} Close Damage Reduction {icon:arrow,1.2} {c_number}[{SF_1} * 100|%|]{/c}

power.skill_desc: Gain {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} Thorns.
You deal {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%x|]{/c} increased damage to Cursed enemies.

1HScythe_Unique_Necro_100.desc: {c_important}Corpse Explosion{/c} consumes up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} additional Corpses around the initial Corpse, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage and with a {c_random}[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} larger radius per additional Corpse.
1HScythe_Unique_Necro_100.flavor:
"The scrolls describe a river of tar that separated the living from the land of the dead. Any unfortunate soul who tried to cross would be dragged down into oblivion."
- Notes of Scholar Kamien
1HScythe_Unique_Necro_100.name: Black River

2HScythe_Unique_Necro_100.desc:
Your {c_important}Darkness{/c} Skills {c_important}{u}Chill{/u}{/c} enemies for up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c}. 

{c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Your {c_important}Darkness{/c} Skills have up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"|%|]{/c} chance to generate {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} additional Essence against {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c} targets.
2HScythe_Unique_Necro_100.flavor:
"My companion swung her odd weapon in a wide arc, and our pursuer stopped short. The look of horror on his face as his body fell to pieces will haunt me forever."
- The Ebon Pages, Canto II, Verse XI
2HScythe_Unique_Necro_100.name: Bloodless Scream

Amulet_Unique_Necro_100.desc: {c_important}Blood Surge{/c} casts a mini nova on your Minions, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage. Damage is increased by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} per target drained by the initial cast, up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"|%|]{/c}.
Amulet_Unique_Necro_100.flavor: Once a sanctum for Rathma's studies, the Temple of the Deathspeaker became a proving grounds for potential leaders of his priesthood. Its halls are filled with the corpses of those who failed.
Amulet_Unique_Necro_100.name: Deathspeaker's Pendant

Boots_Unique_Necro_100.desc: Create desecrated ground beneath your {c_important}Sever{/c} spectres as they travel, damaging enemies for {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Shadow damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
Boots_Unique_Necro_100.flavor:
"The massive door to my family's crypt, which had taken a dozen men to close, was thrown open. Had I known the horrors to come I never would have set foot inside!"
-The Ebon Pages, Canto I, Verse VII
Boots_Unique_Necro_100.name: Greaves of the Empty Tomb

Chest_Unique_Necro_101.desc: When you pick up {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} {c_important}{u}Blood Orbs{/u}{/c}, a free {c_important}Bone Spirit{/c} is spawned, dealing bonus damage based on your current Life percent.
Chest_Unique_Necro_101.flavor:
"The infamous Necromancer Gaza-Thul's mastery over blood magic was indisputable. Many suspect that upon his death, his skin was used to fashion this eldritch armor."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Chest_Unique_Necro_101.name: Blood Artisan's Cuirass

Gloves_Unique_Necro_100.desc: Instead of detonating immediately, {c_important}Corpse Explosion{/c} summons a Volatile Skeleton that charges at a random enemy and explodes. {c_important}Corpse Explosion's{/c} damage is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c}.
Gloves_Unique_Necro_100.flavor:
"Can you not hear it? That endless scream from the cold earth beneath your feet!? They are down there, trapped, blind with rage! Waiting to drag us down into the sod!"
- Ravings of Madman Gustav
Gloves_Unique_Necro_100.name: Howl from Below

Helm_Unique_Necro_100.desc: {c_important}Bone Spear{/c} leaves behind echoes as it travels that explode, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage.
Helm_Unique_Necro_100.flavor:
"Rathma is endless. He was the first Ancient, and will remain at the end. He is the master of the Great Cycle of Being. When Death comes for him, why should he fear it?"
- Vauntus, Acolyte of Rathma
Helm_Unique_Necro_100.name: Deathless Visage

Ring_Unique_Necro_100.desc:
While you have {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} or more Minions you gain:
{icon:bullet,1.2} {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} chance to empower all of your Minions, causing the next attack from each to explode for {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Physical damage.
Ring_Unique_Necro_100.flavor: The signet of Mendeln ul-Diomed, the founder of the Priests of Rathma and the first Necromancer, was lost for over 3,000 years. The immense power over death held within, however, has not diminished.
Ring_Unique_Necro_100.name: Ring of Mendeln

Legendary_Rogue_124.desc: {c_important}Rapid Fire{/c} has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to ricochet to another target.
Legendary_Rogue_124.name: Repeating

Legendary_Rogue_125.desc: Each {c_important}{u}Chilled{/u}{/c} or {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c} enemy you {c_important}Evade{/c} through grants you a {c_important}{u}Barrier{/u}{/c} that absorbs {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds, absorbing up to a maximum of {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} damage.
Legendary_Rogue_125.name: Snap Frozen

legendary_rogue_003.desc:
Your Shadow Clones also mimic the {c_important}Imbuements{/c} applied to your Skills. 
Casting an {c_important}Imbuement{/c} Skill grants your active {c_important}Shadow Clone{/c} {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_rogue_003.name: of Imitated Imbuement

legendary_rogue_004.desc: Gain a free {c_important}Dark Shroud{/c} shadow every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds when standing still. Each {c_important}Dark Shroud{/c} shadow grants {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} increased Damage Reduction.
legendary_rogue_004.name: Enshrouding

legendary_rogue_010.desc: Whenever {c_important}Penetrating Shot{/c} damages an enemy, {c_number}2{/c} additional arrows split off to either side. These side arrows deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of {c_important}Penetrating Shot's{/c} Base damage and do not split.
legendary_rogue_010.name: Trickshot

legendary_rogue_011.desc: {c_important}Flurry{/c} damages enemies in a circle around you and deals {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage.
legendary_rogue_011.name: of Encircling Blades

legendary_rogue_013.desc: When a {c_important}Dark Shroud{/c} shadow would be removed you trigger an explosion around yourself that deals {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Shadow damage.
legendary_rogue_013.name: of Volatile Shadows

legendary_rogue_014.desc: Damaging an Elite enemy with a {c_important}Basic{/c} Skill generates {c_number}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} Energy.
legendary_rogue_014.name: Energizing

legendary_rogue_018.desc: When you {c_important}Evade{/c} or {c_important}Shadow Step{/c}, you leave behind a cluster of exploding {c_important}Stun Grenades{/c} that deal {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} total Physical damage and Stun enemies for {c_number}[PowerTag.Rogue_Grenades."Script Formula 2"|2|]{/c} seconds.
legendary_rogue_018.name: of Surprise

legendary_rogue_019.desc: {c_important}Caltrops{/c} also throw a cluster of exploding {c_important}Stun Grenades{/c} that deal {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} total Physical damage and Stun enemies for {c_number}[PowerTag.Rogue_Grenades."Script Formula 2"|2|]{/c} seconds.
legendary_rogue_019.name: Trickster's

legendary_rogue_020.desc: When casting an {c_important}Imbuement{/c} Skill you trigger an {c_important}Imbued{/c} explosion around yourself, applying the {c_important}Imbuement{/c} effects and dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage of the same type.
legendary_rogue_020.name: of Unstable Imbuements

legendary_rogue_021.desc: {c_important}Twisting Blades{/c} orbit for a short time after they return to you, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of {c_important}Twisting Blades'{/c} return damage per hit. Based on the distance the blades returned, the orbit damage increases up to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1 * 2|%|]{/c} of the return damage.
legendary_rogue_021.name: Bladedancer's

legendary_rogue_023.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Damaging a Poisoned enemy with a {c_important}Shadow Imbued{/c} Skill has up to a {c_number} {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"|%|]{/c}{/c} chance to create a toxic explosion that applies {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Poisoning damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds to the target and surrounding enemies.
legendary_rogue_023.name: Toxic Alchemist's

legendary_rogue_024.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Damaging a {c_important}{u}Chilled{/u}{/c} or {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c} enemy with a {c_important}Shadow Imbued{/c} Skill has up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} chance to release an explosion that deals {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Cold damage to the target and surrounding enemies, {c_important}{u}Chilling{/u}{/c} them for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"|%|]{/c}.
legendary_rogue_024.name: Icy Alchemist's

legendary_rogue_026.desc: When you cast {c_important}Dash{/c}, a Shadow Clone is spawned at your location that also casts {c_important}Dash{/c}, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of the Base damage.
legendary_rogue_026.name: Shadowslicer

legendary_rogue_028.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Your {c_important}Marksman{/c} Skills have up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 2"|%|]{/c} chance to create an arrow storm at the enemy's location, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Physical damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds. You can have up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} active arrow storms.
legendary_rogue_028.name: of Arrow Storms

legendary_rogue_029.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Critical Strikes with {c_important}Poison Imbued{/c} Skills have up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 2"|%|]{/c} chance to create a toxic pool that deals {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Poisoning damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds to enemies within. While standing in the pool {c_important}Poison Imbuement{/c} has no Cooldown and no Charge limit.
legendary_rogue_029.name: of Bursting Venoms

legendary_rogue_100.desc: {c_important}Barrage's{/c} arrows have a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to split into {c_number}2{/c} arrows whenever they ricochet.
legendary_rogue_100.name: of Branching Volleys

legendary_rogue_101.desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Dealing direct damage to enemies affected by your {c_important}Trap{/c} Skills has up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to make them {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_rogue_101.name: Blast-Trapper's

legendary_rogue_102.desc: Your {c_important}Grenade{/c} Skills count as {c_important}Trap{/c} Skills. Whenever you arm a {c_important}Trap{/c} or drop {c_important}Grenades{/c}, you gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%+|]{/c} increased Movement Speed for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_rogue_102.name: of Explosive Verve

legendary_rogue_103.desc: Dealing direct damage to a {c_important}{u}Dazed{/u}{/c} Enemy with an {c_important}Agility{/c} Skill grants {c_important}{u}Stealth{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds. Breaking {c_important}{u}Stealth{/u}{/c} with an attack grants you {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*100|%|]{/c} Control Impaired Duration Reduction for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_rogue_103.name: of Uncanny Treachery

legendary_rogue_104.desc: Explosions from the {c_important}Victimize{/c} Key Passive Heal you for {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Life for each enemy damaged, up to a maximum of {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Life.
legendary_rogue_104.name: of Cruel Sustenance

legendary_rogue_105.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Making an enemy {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} has up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to grant {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%+|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Chance for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds, up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0" * Affix."Static Value 2"|%+|]{/c}.
legendary_rogue_105.name: Vengeful

legendary_rogue_106.desc: Killing a {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} enemy grants you {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased Energy Regeneration for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_rogue_106.name: Ravenous

legendary_rogue_107.desc: Upon taking damage from surrounding enemies, you drop a {c_important}Smoke Grenade{/c} and Dodge the next {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} attacks within {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds. This effect can only occur once every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_rogue_107.name: Escape Artist's

legendary_rogue_108.desc: Each stack of the {c_important}Momentum{/c} Key Passive Heals you for {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Life per second.
legendary_rogue_108.name: of Stolen Vigor

legendary_rogue_109.desc: When you break {c_important}{u}Stealth{/u}{/c} with an attack, you drop a cluster of exploding {c_important}Stun Grenades{/c} around your location that deal {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} total Physical damage and Stun enemies for {c_number}[PowerTag.Rogue_Grenades."Script Formula 2"|2|]{/c} seconds.
legendary_rogue_109.name: Opportunist's

legendary_rogue_110.desc: You automatically drop a {c_important}Smoke Grenade{/c} at the end of {c_important}Dash{/c}. {c_important}Dash's{/c} Cooldown is reduced by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|2|]{/c} seconds for each enemy {c_important}{u}Dazed{/u}{/c} this way, up to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 0"|2|]{/c} seconds.
legendary_rogue_110.name: of Quickening Fog

legendary_rogue_111.desc: You take {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} less damage from Crowd Controlled enemies. Whenever a Crowd Controlled enemy deals direct damage to you, gain {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%+|]{/c} Movement Speed for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_rogue_111.name: Cheat's

legendary_rogue_112.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Damaging a {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} enemy with a {c_important}Core{/c} Skill has up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to drop a Healing Potion.
legendary_rogue_112.name: of Siphoned Victuals

legendary_rogue_113.desc: Your {c_important}Imbuement{/c} Skill effects have {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased potency against {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} enemies.
legendary_rogue_113.name: of Corruption

legendary_rogue_114.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Dealing direct damage to a {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} enemy has up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to {c_important}{u}Daze{/u}{/c} them for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_rogue_114.name: Mangler's

legendary_rogue_116.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Critical Strikes with {c_important}Marksman{/c} Skills have up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to grant a free {c_important}Dark Shroud{/c} shadow.
legendary_rogue_116.name: Umbrous

legendary_rogue_117.desc: {c_important}{u}Chilled{/u}{/c} enemies Poisoned by {c_important}Poison Imbuement{/c} will be further {c_important}{u}Chilled{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"*2|%|]{/c} per second. You deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} additional Poison damage to {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c} enemies.
legendary_rogue_117.name: of Noxious Ice

legendary_rogue_118.desc: {c_important}Shadow Step{/c} has an additional Charge. Killing an enemy with {c_important}Shadow Step{/c} refunds a Charge and increases the damage of {c_important}Shadow Step{/c} by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds, up to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 1"|%x|]{/c}.
legendary_rogue_118.name: Ravager's

legendary_rogue_119.desc: Using an {c_important}Agility{/c} Skill reduces the Cooldown of your next {c_important}Subterfuge{/c} Skill by {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}. Using a {c_important}Subterfuge{/c} Skill increases the damage of your next {c_important}Agility{/c} Skill by {c_random}[Affix_Value_2|%x|]{/c}.
legendary_rogue_119.name: of Synergy

legendary_rogue_120.desc: {c_important}Evading{/c} through an enemy infected by {c_important}Shadow Imbuement{/c} grants {c_important}{u}Stealth{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds. Breaking {c_important}{u}Stealth{/u}{/c} with an attack grants you {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*100|%|]{/c} Maximum Life on Kill for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_rogue_120.name: of Lethal Dusk

legendary_rogue_121.desc: While you have both bonuses from the {c_important}Close Quarters Combat{/c} Key Passive active, your Dodge Chance increases by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%+|]{/c} whenever you're hit by a Close enemy. Successfully Dodging resets this bonus.
legendary_rogue_121.name: of Elusive Menace

legendary_rogue_122.desc: {c_important}Poison Trap{/c} no longer breaks {c_important}{u}Stealth{/u}{/c} and triggers no Cooldown or arm time while you are in {c_important}{u}Stealth{/u}{/c}. All {c_important}Poison Traps{/c} activate when you exit {c_important}{u}Stealth{/u}{/c} and {c_important}Poison Trap's{/c} Cooldown will be {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds per trap placed.
legendary_rogue_122.name: Infiltrator's

legendary_rogue_123.desc: {c_important}{u}Chilled{/u}{/c} enemies hit by your {c_important}Grenade{/c} Skills have a chance equal to double your Critical Strike Chance to be instantly {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds. You deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Damage against {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c} enemies.
legendary_rogue_123.name: Frostbitten

Paragon_Rogue_Legendary_001.desc: After taking Poison, Cold, or Shadow damage, the enemy takes {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} less damage from you from that type, and {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} more damage from the other two types for the next {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Rogue_Legendary_002.desc: When you attack with an {c_important}Imbued{/c} Skill you gain {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} Resistance and {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|x%|]{/c} increased damage for that {c_important}Imbuement's{/c} element for {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Rogue_Legendary_003.desc: While any of your {c_important}Imbuement{/c} Skills are on cooldown, your {c_important}Imbueable{/c} attacks have a {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} chance to gain one of those {c_important}Imbuement{/c} effects.

Paragon_Rogue_Legendary_004.desc: You deal {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|x]{/c} increased damage to Distant enemies but deal {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%x|]{/c} decreased damage to Close enemies.

Paragon_Rogue_Legendary_005.desc: You deal {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage to Close enemies but deal {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%x|]{/c} decreased damage to Distant enemies.

Paragon_Rogue_Legendary_006.desc: Your {c_important}Marksman{/c} Skills grant your next {c_important}Cutthroat{/c} Skill {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage. Your {c_important}Cutthroat{/c} Skills grant your next {c_important}Marksman{/c} Skill {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage.

Paragon_Rogue_Legendary_007.desc: You deal {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage for each Nearby enemy that is Crowd Controlled, up to {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100 * {SF_1}|%x|]{/c}.

Paragon_Rogue_Legendary_008.desc: You deal {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Damage to enemies affected by your {c_important}Trap{/c} Skills.

Paragon_Rogue_Legendary_009.desc: When {c_important}Inner Sight's{/c} gauge becomes full, you gain {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%+|]{/c} Dodge Chance for {c_number}[{SF_1|1|}]{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Rogue_Legendary_010.desc: Whenever you deal damage to a {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} enemy, they take {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage from you for {c_number}[SF_2]{/c} seconds, up to {c_number}[{SF_0}*{SF_1}*100|%x|]{/c}.

Paragon_Rogue_Legendary_011.desc: Your {c_important}Ultimate{/c} Skills deal {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage and grant you {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage for {c_number}[SF_2]{/c} seconds when cast.

Paragon_Rogue_Legendary_012.desc: Your non-damage {c_important}Combo Point{/c} bonuses are increased by {c_number}[{SF_4}*100|%|]{/c} when you spend {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} {c_important}Combo Points{/c}.

Paragon_Rogue_Legendary_013.desc: For each Close enemy, your Dodge Chance is increased by {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%+|]{/c}, up to {c_number}[{SF_0}*100*{SF_1}|%+|]{/c}.

Paragon_Rogue_Legendary_014.desc: When you kill a Poisoned enemy, they leave a pool of poison on the ground that deals {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} of that enemy's Maximum Life as Poison damage over {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Rogue_Legendary_015.desc: For each enemy that is {c_important}{u}Chilled{/u}{/c} in the area, you deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage, up to {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100*{SF_1}|%|]{/c}.

Paragon_Rogue_Legendary_016.desc: You deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage to enemies affected by {c_important}Shadow Imbuement's{/c} infection.

power.skill_desc: Moving through enemies while {c_important}Blade Shift{/c} is active refreshes its duration. After moving through enemies {c_number}{SF_4}{/c} times, your next {c_important}Blade Shift{/c} will {c_important}{u}Daze{/u}{/c} enemies for {c_number}{buffduration:MOD_DAZE}{/c} seconds.
The Skill that breaks {c_important}Concealment{/c} will always be a guaranteed Critical Strike.
The Skill that breaks {c_important}Concealment{/c} makes enemies {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_5}{/c} seconds.
Damaging an enemy with {c_important}Blade Shift{/c} grants {c_number}[{SF_8}*100|%+|]{/c} Movement Speed while {c_important}Blade Shift{/c} is active, up to {c_number}[{SF_8}*{SF_15}*100|%+|]{/c}.
Damaging a Crowd Controlled or {c_important}{u}Injured{/u}{/c} enemy with {c_important}Invigorating Strike{/c} increases its Energy Regeneration bonus to {c_number}[({SF_4}+{SF_6})*100|%x|]{/c}.
You have {c_number}[{SF_18} * 100|%+|]{/c} Critical Strike Chance against enemies inside your {c_important}Caltrops{/c}. Double this amount against {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} enemies.
Gain {c_number}{SF_9}{/c} Energy when {c_important}Puncture{/c} damages a Crowd Controlled enemy.

When {c_important}Heartseeker{/c} Critically Strikes, gain {c_number}[{SF_22}*100|%+|]{/c} Attack Speed for {c_number}{SF_23}{/c} seconds. Double this amount if the enemy is {c_important}Vulnerable{/c}.
Every {c_number}3rd{/c} cast of {c_important}Forceful Arrow{/c} additionally has a {c_number}[{SF_14}*100|%+|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Chance.
{c_important}Twisting Blades{/c} deals {c_number}[{SF_16}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage when returning.

Each time {c_important}Flurry{/c} damages a Crowd Controlled or {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} enemy, you are Healed for {c_number}[{SF_8}*100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life {c_number}([Max(1,PlayerHealthMax() * {SF_8})]){/c}, up to {c_number}[{SF_6}*{SF_8}*100|%|]{/c} Maximum Life {c_number}([PlayerHealthMax() * {SF_8} * {SF_6}]){/c} per cast.
{c_important}Penetrating Shot{/c} deals {c_number}[{SF_6}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage per enemy it pierces.

Each subsequent arrow from {c_important}Rapid Fire{/c} has {c_number}[{SF_19}*100|%+|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Chance, up to {c_number}[{SF_19}*{SF_10}*100|%+|]{/c} for the {c_number}{SF_10}th{/c} arrow.
{c_important}Barrage's{/c} ricochet chance is increased to {c_number}100%{/c} for arrows that damage a {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} enemy or Critically Strike any enemy.
Damaging an enemy with {c_important}Shadow Step{/c} increases your Critical Strike Chance against them by {c_number}[{SF_14}*100|%+|]{/c} for {c_number}{buffduration:AMPLIFY_CRIT_CHANCE}{/c} seconds.
Enemies damaged by {c_important}Dash{/c} take {c_number}[{SF_20}*100|%x|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Damage from you for {c_number}{buffduration:BONUS_CRIT_DAMAGE}{/c} seconds.

{c_important}Invigorating Strike{/c} additionally grants {c_number}[{SF_14} * 100|%+|]{/c} Lucky Hit Chance. Hitting a Crowd Controlled or {c_important}{u}Injured{/u}{/c} enemy increases this bonus to {c_number}[{SF_14} * {SF_15} *100|%+|]{/c} Lucky Hit Chance.
Enemies take {c_number}[{SF_14} * 100|%x|]{/c} increased damage from you each second they are in {c_important}Caltrops{/c}.
{c_important}Dark Shroud's{/c} shadows have a {c_number}[{SF_3} * 100|%|]{/c} chance to not be consumed.
Enemies affected by {c_important}Smoke Grenade{/c} take {c_number}[{SF_6}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage from you.
{c_important}Poison Trap{/c} Knocks Down enemies for {c_number}{buffduration:KNOCKDOWN}{/c} seconds when it activates.
You gain {c_number}[SF_7]{/c} Energy when you enter {c_important}Concealment{/c}.
{c_important}Poison Imbuement's{/c} Poisoning Duration is increased by {c_number}{SF_3}{/c} second.
You have {c_number}[{SF_15}*100|%+|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Chance against {c_important}{u}Injured{/u}{/c} enemies infected by {c_important}Shadow Imbuement{/c}.
{c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} {c_important}Cold Imbued{/c} Skills have up to a {c_number}[{SF_21}*100|%|]{/c} chance to make enemies {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_22}{/c} seconds.

Critical Strikes with {c_important}Marksman{/c} Skills grant you {c_important}Precision{/c}. You gain {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|x%|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Damage per stack of {c_important}Precision{/c}, up to a maximum of {c_number}[({SF_0}*100)*{SF_1}|x%|]{/c}.

When you reach maximum {c_important}Precision{/c}, your next {c_important}Marksman{/c} Skill is a guaranteed Critical Strike that deals {c_number}[{SF_2} * 100|x%|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Damage, then consumes all stacks of {c_important}Precision{/c}.
Your {c_important}Evade{/c} Cooldown is reduced by {c_number}[{SF_0}|1|]{/c} seconds when you {c_important}{u}Daze{/u}{/c} an enemy.
If {c_important}Flurry{/c} hits any {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} enemy it will make all enemies hit by that cast {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_7}{/c} seconds.
Every {c_number}3rd{/c} cast of {c_important}Barrage{/c} makes enemies {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_8}{/c} seconds.

{c_important}Shadow Step's{/c} Cooldown is reduced by {c_number}{SF_13}{/c} seconds when it damages an enemy you haven't hit with {c_important}Shadow Step{/c} in the last {c_number}{SF_18}{/c} seconds.

{c_label}Cooldown:{/c_label} {c_resource}{Cooldown Time}{/c_resource} seconds
Imbue your weapons with frigid energies. Your next {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} {c_important}Imbueable{/c} Skills deal Cold damage and {c_important}{u}Chill{/u}{/c} enemies for {c_number}[{SF_3}|%|]{/c} per hit.

{c_label}Cooldown:{/c_label} {c_resource}{Cooldown Time}{/c_resource} seconds
Surround yourself with up to {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} protective shadows. Gain {c_number}[{SF_1} * 100|1%|]{/c} Damage Reduction per active shadow. Each time you take direct damage, that damage is reduced and a shadow is consumed.
Every {c_number}{SF_20}rd{/c} cast of {c_important}Puncture{/c} will also ricochet up to {c_number}2{/c} times. Critical Strikes will always ricochet.
While you have at least {c_number}[{SF_6}]{/c} active shadows from {c_important}Dark Shroud{/c}, gain {c_number}[{SF_4} * 100|%+|]{/c} Critical Strike Chance.

{c_label}Cooldown:{/c} {c_resource}{Cooldown Time}{/c} seconds
{if:ADVANCED_TOOLTIP}{c_label}Lucky Hit Chance: {/c}{c_resource}[{Combat_Effect_Chance_Script_Formula_Override:1}|%|]{/c}
{/if}Place a trap that arms after {c_number}{buffduration:ARMING}{/c} seconds. It activates when an enemy moves within range, applying {c_number}{payload:TOOLTIP_DAMAGE}{/c} Poisoning damage over {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds to enemies in the area.

You can have {c_number}{SF_10}{/c} armed traps out at once.
Enemies damaged by {c_important}Shadow Step{/c} are Stunned for {c_number}{buffduration:STUN}{/c} seconds.
{c_important}Cold Imbued{/c} Skills deal {c_number}[{SF_20}*100|%x|]{/c} damage to Crowd Controlled enemies. Double this bonus against {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/C} enemies.
You deal {c_number}[{SF_16}*100|%x|]{/c} increased Poison damage to enemies standing inside your {c_important}Poison Trap{/c}.
Whenever a single cast of {c_important}Barrage{/c} ricochets at least {c_number}{SF_36}{/c} times, your next cast gains {c_number}[{SF_35}*100|%+|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Chance.

{c_important}Heartseeker{/c} also increases the Critical Strike Damage the enemy takes from you by {c_number}[{SF_12}*100|%+|]{/c} for {c_number}{SF_11}{/c} seconds, up to {c_number}[{SF_12}*{SF_10}*100|%+|]{/c}.
Each active shadow from {c_important}Dark Shroud{/c} grants you {c_number}[{SF_5} * 100|%+|]{/c} increased Movement Speed.
{c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} {c_important}Poison Imbued{/c} Skills have up to a {c_number}[{SF_13}*100|%|]{/c} chance to apply double the amount of Poisoning damage over time.
Enemies are {c_important}{u}Dazed{/u}{/c} while impaled with {c_important}Twisting Blades{/c}.

{c_important}Dash{/c} Slows enemies it hits by {c_number}[{SF_19}* 100|%|]{/c} for {c_number}{buffduration:SLOW}{/c} seconds. Any enemy already Slowed will be {c_important}{u}Dazed{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_12}{/c} seconds instead.
Enemies damaged by {c_important}Shadow Imbued{/c} Skills take {c_number}[{SF_17}*100|%x|]{/c} increased Non-Physical damage from you for {c_number}{buffduration:AMPLIFY_DAMAGE}{/c} seconds.

{c_label}Cooldown:{/c_label} {c_resource}{Cooldown Time}{/c_resource} seconds
{if:ADVANCED_TOOLTIP}{c_label}Lucky Hit Chance: {/c}{c_resource}[{Combat Effect Chance}|%|]{/c}
{/if}Imbue your weapons with festering shadows. Your next {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} {c_important}Imbueable{/c} Skills deal Shadow damage and infect enemies for {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds. Infected enemies explode on death, dealing {c_number}{payload:DEATH_AOE}{/c} damage to all surrounding enemies. 

If the infection expires before the enemy dies, it will deal {c_number}{payload:DEATH_AOE}{/c} damage to only that enemy.

If {c_important}Penetrating Shot{/c} damages at least {c_number}{SF_20}{/c} enemies, your next {c_important}Penetrating Shot{/c} has a {c_number}[{SF_21}*100|%+|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Chance.
{c_important}Caltrops{/c} now deals Cold damage and {c_important}{u}Chills{/u}{/c} enemies for {c_number}{SF_16}%{/c} per second.
Evading through an enemy will cause your next {c_important}Flurry{/c} to Stun enemies for {c_number}{buffduration:STUN}{/c} seconds.
{c_important}Forceful Arrow{/c} Knocks Back Non-Elite enemies if they are Close. If they collide with another enemy, both are Knocked Down for {c_number}{buffduration:KNOCKDOWN}{/c} seconds.
Dealing damage to Crowd Controlled enemies with {c_important}Dash{/c} reduces its Charge Cooldown by {c_number}[{SF_16}|1|]{/c} seconds, up to {c_number}{SF_17}{/c} seconds per cast.

{c_label}Cooldown:{/c_label} {c_resource}{Cooldown Time}{/c_resource} seconds
Your shadow mimicks your actions for {c_number}{buffduration:CLONE_MIMIC}{/c} seconds.
The shadow deals {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} of your damage.
You are {c_important}{u}Unstoppable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_10}{/c} seconds after casting {c_important}Shadow Clone{/c}.
Enemies are Pulled into {c_important}Death Trap{/c} when it activates.
Your {c_important}Shadow Clone{/c} deals an additional {c_number}20%{/c} of your damage.
If {c_important}Death Trap{/c} kills an enemy, its Cooldown is reduced by {c_number}{SF_17}{/c} seconds.
Using a Cooldown increases your Dodge Chance by {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} for {c_number}{buffduration:DODGE_BONUS}{/c} seconds.
Gain {c_number}{SF_21}{/c} Energy per cast of {c_important}Rapid Fire{/c} when it damages a {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} enemy.

Gain a bonus when attacking based on weapon type:
{icon:bullet,1.2} {c_label}Daggers:{/c} {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage to {c_important}{u}Healthy{/u}{/c} enemies.
{icon:bullet,1.2} {c_label}Swords:{/c} {c_number}[{SF_3}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage.
{icon:bullet,1.2} {c_label}Bows:{/c} {c_number}[{SF_5}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage to {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} enemies.
{icon:bullet,1.2} {c_label}Crossbows:{/c} {c_number}[{SF_7}*100|%x|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Damage.
Non-Physical damage you deal has a {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%+|]{/c} increased Lucky Hit Chance.

When {c_important}Poison Trap{/c} or {c_important}Death Trap{/c} activates, you gain {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%+|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Chance against {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} and Crowd Controlled enemies for {c_number}{buffduration:CRIT_CHANCE}{/c} seconds.
After using an {c_important}Ultimate{/c} Skill, restore {c_number}[{SF_0}]{/c} Energy.
While {c_important}{u}Stealthed{/u}{/c}, you Heal for {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} Maximum Life {c_number}([Max(1,PlayerHealthMax() * {SF_8})]){/c} per second.

You deal {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage to {c_important}{u}Chilled{/u}{/c} enemies. This bonus increases to {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%x|]{/c} against {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c} enemies.

While at or above {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%|]{/c} maximum Energy, gain {c_number}[{SF_1} * 100|%+|]{/c} increased Movement Speed. While below {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%|]{/c} maximum Energy, gain {c_number}[{SF_2} * 100|%+|]{/c} increased Attack Speed.
Every {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} Energy you spend grants you {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%+|]{/c} increased Lucky Hit Chance for {c_number}{buffduration:BONUS_HIT_EFFECT_CHANCE}{/c} seconds.

{c_important}Cutthroat{/c} Skills grant a stack of {c_important}Momentum{/c} for {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds if they either:
{icon:bullet,1.2} Hit a Stunned, {c_important}{u}Dazed{/u}{/c}, or {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c} enemy
{icon:bullet,1.2} Hit any enemy from behind

While at {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} stacks of {c_important}Momentum{/c} you gain:
{icon:bullet,1.2} {c_number}[{SF_3}*100|%|]{/c} increased Damage Reduction
{icon:bullet,1.2} {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%x|]{/c} increased Energy Regeneration

1HDagger_Unique_Rogue_001.desc: Your {c_important}Core{/c} Skills deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage when spending {c_number}3{/c} {c_important}Combo Points{/c}. Your {c_important}Basic{/c} Skills using this weapon have a {c_number}[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} chance to generate {c_number}3{/c} {c_important}Combo Points{/c}.
1HDagger_Unique_Rogue_001.flavor:
"I've never seen such ruthless butchery. He deserves to be be shipped off to die in the swamps with the rest of the godless murderers."
- Witness to the murder of Sergeant Walcot
1HDagger_Unique_Rogue_001.name: Condemnation

1HDagger_Unique_Rogue_002.desc: Hits with this weapon increase your Attack Speed by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1 * 100|1%+|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds, up to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 1" * 100|1%+|]{/c}.
1HDagger_Unique_Rogue_002.flavor: When Caldeum's gates closed, Asheara led her Iron Wolves out of the city knowing full well they would never return. Instead they roamed Kehjistan pledging their blades to any who were in need.
1HDagger_Unique_Rogue_002.name: Asheara's Khanjar

2HBow_Unique_Rogue_001.desc: The first direct damage you deal to an enemy is a guaranteed Critical Strike. If you had maximum stacks of the {c_important}Precision{/c} Key Passive when you cast the Skill, gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} {c_important}Energy{/c}, this can only happen once per cast.
2HBow_Unique_Rogue_001.flavor:
"Genai took up her bow and aimed at the sun itself. The light burned her eyes, but her arrow flew true. Wounded, the sun hid, and brought forth the first night.
- Fable of the Great Sky-Hunt
2HBow_Unique_Rogue_001.name: Skyhunter

2HBow_Unique_Rogue_006.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Hits with this weapon have up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to deal double damage and Knock Back the target.
2HBow_Unique_Rogue_006.flavor:
"There have been numerous world-shaping conflicts throughout history. This bow has been found on the battlefield of every one, and always in the hands of the victors."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
2HBow_Unique_Rogue_006.name: Windforce

Amulet_Unique_Rogue_100.desc: Your {c_important}Rain of Arrows{/c} is always {c_important}Imbued{/c} with all {c_important}Imbuements{/c} at once.
Amulet_Unique_Rogue_100.flavor:
"Let the great gates of Caldeum be sealed. Let its proud walls stand fiercely defended. The rest of Kehjistan may suffer this plague, but my city, and my people, will not."
- Proclamation of Hakan II
Amulet_Unique_Rogue_100.name: Word of Hakan

Gloves_Unique_Rogue_100.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Damaging a {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} enemy with a {c_important}Marksman{/c} or {c_important}Cutthroat{/c} Skill has up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to summon a Shadow Clone that mimics your attack.
Gloves_Unique_Rogue_100.flavor: Dark wisps creep hungrily across these gloves, like an assassin's blade seeking a life to steal on a moonless night.
Gloves_Unique_Rogue_100.name: Grasp of Shadow

Helm_Unique_Rogue_001.desc: You gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased Lucky Hit Chance against Crowd Controlled enemies.
Helm_Unique_Rogue_001.flavor:
"He is banished from the Guild, his name stricken from the Book. His punishment is to never have been." 
- Excerpt from a burned parchment
Helm_Unique_Rogue_001.name: Cowl of the Nameless

Pants_Unique_Rogue_004.desc: Unless it hits a Boss or Player, {c_important}Death Trap{/c} will continue to re-arm itself until it kills an enemy. However, {c_important}Death Trap's{/c} Cooldown is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}.
Pants_Unique_Rogue_004.flavor:
"And so, when the sun dipped behind the hills each night, he knew that Ashen Jack would soon be near. Watching, and waiting."
- Greenslade's Tales, Chapter 2: "Each Long Night"
Pants_Unique_Rogue_004.name: Eyes in the Dark

Sorcerer_Enchantment_ArcLash.desc: When you use a Cooldown, enemies around you are Stunned for {c_number}[{SF_0}|1|]{/c} seconds.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_ChainLightning.desc: {c_important}Chain Lightning{/c} forms automatically after spending {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} Mana.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_FlameShield.desc: {c_important}Flame Shield{/c} automatically activates when you take fatal damage. Can only happen once every {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_FrostNova.desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Your {c_important}Conjuration{/c} Skills have a {c_number}[{SF_0}|%|]{/c} chance to unleash a {c_important}Frost Nova{/c} when hitting enemies.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_Frostbolt.desc: Direct damage from Skills applies up to {c_number}[{SF_0}|%|]{/c} {c_important}{u}Chill{/u}{/c}.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_FrozenOrb.desc: Whenever you cast a Non-{c_important}Basic{/c} Skill, you have a {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} chance to launch a {c_important}Frozen Orb{/c} at a Nearby enemy.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_Hydra.desc: After spending {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} Mana, a {c_number}{SF_0}{/c}-headed {c_important}Hydra{/c} spawns for {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} seconds.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_IceArmor.desc: Upon getting hit, you have a {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} chance to apply {c_important}Ice Armor{/c}.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_IceBlades.desc: For every {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds in Cooldowns you spend, you spawn an {c_important}Ice Blades{/c} on a random enemy.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_IceShards.desc: {c_important}Ice Shards{/c} automatically conjure and fly towards {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c} enemies.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_Incinerate.desc: Every {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds, a serpent spawns and {c_important}Incinerates{/c} enemies for {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} seconds.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_LightningSpear.desc: Absorbing {c_important}{u}Crackling Energy{/u}{/c} has a {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} chance to conjure a {c_important}Lightning Spear{/c}.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_Meteor.desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} {c_number}[{SF_0}|%|]{/c} chance for a {c_important}Meteor{/c} to fall on enemies.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_Spark.desc: Killing an enemy has a {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%|]{/c} chance to form a {c_important}{u}Crackling Energy{/u}{/c}.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_Teleport.desc: {c_important}Evade{/c} is replaced with a short range {c_important}Teleport{/c} on a {c_number}[{SF_0}|1|]{/c} second Cooldown.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_Teleport_Active.desc: {c_red}Teleport description here - since this is a skill that replaces your Evade button, you should never see this.{/c}
Sorcerer_Enchantment_Teleport_Active.name: Teleport - Evade Version

legendary_sorc_039.desc: You may have {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} additional {c_important}Hydra{/c} active, but {c_important}Hydra's{/c} duration is reduced by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}.

legendary_sorc_043.desc: An hail of {c_important}Meteorites{/c} falls during {c_important}Inferno{/c}, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Fire Damage on impact. Your {c_important}Meteorites{/c} Immobilize enemies for {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} seconds.

legendary_sorc_100.desc: While channeling {c_important}Incinerate{/c}, your Burning damage is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c}.

legendary_sorc_101.desc: While both bonuses from the {c_important}Esu's Ferocity{/c} Key Passive are active, your Attack Speed is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}.

legendary_sorc_102.desc: While enemies are affected by more Damage Over Time than their total Life, you deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased Burning damage to them.

legendary_sorc_103.desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Burning Damage has up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to restore {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Mana.
legendary_sorc_103.name: Incendiary

legendary_sorc_104.name: of Singed Extremities

legendary_sorc_105.desc: Coming in contact with your {c_important}Firewall{/c} grants you {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%+|]{/c} Movement Speed for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_sorc_105.name: Flamewalker's

legendary_sorc_106.desc: {c_important}Meteorites{/c} fall around {c_important}Meteor{/c}, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Fire damage on impact. Your {c_important}Meteorites{/c} additionally Burn enemies they hit for {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds.

legendary_sorc_107.desc: When you cast {c_important}Blizzard{/c} it will periodically spawn exploding {c_important}Ice Spikes{/c} that deal {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage. Your {c_important}Ice Spikes{/c} deal {c_number}[Affix_Value_1 * 100|%x|]{/c} increased damage to {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c} enemies.

legendary_sorc_108.desc: Casting {c_important}Ice Armor{/c} makes you {c_important}{u}Unstoppable{/u}{/c} for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds.
legendary_sorc_108.name: Snowveiled

legendary_sorc_109.desc: While {c_important}Ice Armor{/c} is active, you leave behind exploding {c_important}Ice Spikes{/c} that deal {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage. Your {c_important}Ice Spikes{/c} {c_important}{u}Chill{/u}{/c} enemies for {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}.

legendary_sorc_110.desc: {c_important}Ice Shards{/c} pierce {c_random}[ceil(1/(Affix_Value_1/100))-1]{/c} times, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} less damage per subsequent enemy hit.

legendary_sorc_111.desc: While {c_important}Deep Freeze{/c} is active, you restore {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life and Mana per second.
legendary_sorc_111.name: Encased

legendary_sorc_112.desc: Your Lucky Hit Chance is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%+|]{/c} while you have a {c_important}{u}Barrier{/u}{/c} active.
legendary_sorc_112.name: of Fortune

legendary_sorc_113.desc: When you {c_important}{u}Freeze{/u}{/c} an enemy there is a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance they become {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_sorc_113.name: of Biting Cold

legendary_sorc_115.desc: You deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage to {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} enemies while you have a {c_important}{u}Barrier{/u}{/c}.
legendary_sorc_115.name: Storm Swell

legendary_sorc_116.desc: While {c_important}Deep Freeze{/c} is active, exploding {c_important}Ice Spikes{/c} form in the area, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Cold damage. Your {c_important}Ice Spikes{/c} have a {c_number}[Affix_Value_1 * 100|%|]{/c} increased explosion radius.
legendary_sorc_116.name: of the Frozen Tundra

legendary_sorc_117.desc: {c_important}Unstable Currents{/c} has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to cast an additional {c_important}Shock{/c} Skill.
legendary_sorc_117.name: of Overwhelming Currents

legendary_sorc_118.desc: Each time {c_important}Chain Lightning{/c} bounces off you, gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} Mana.
legendary_sorc_118.name: Recharging

legendary_sorc_119.desc: {c_important}Ball Lightning{/c} orbits around you, but its damage is decreased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}.
legendary_sorc_119.name: Gravitational

legendary_sorc_120.desc: The {c_important}Vyr's Mastery{/c} Key Passive's Damage Reduction is increased by  {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} for each Close enemy, up to {c_number}[Affix_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c}.
legendary_sorc_120.name: Mage-Lord's

legendary_sorc_121.desc: {c_important}Lightning Spear{/c} has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to spawn an additional {c_important}Lightning Spear{/c} when you cast it.
legendary_sorc_121.name: of Splintering Energy

legendary_sorc_122.desc: {c_important}Chain Lightning{/c} has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to chain {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} additional times.
legendary_sorc_122.name: of the Unbroken Tether

legendary_sorc_123.desc: Gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} Movement Speed for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds after {c_important}Teleporting{/c}.
legendary_sorc_123.name: of the Bounding Conduit

legendary_sorc_124.desc: While {c_important}Unstable Currents{/c} is not active, your {c_important}Shock{/c} Skills have a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to trigger a free cast from it.
legendary_sorc_124.name: Stable

legendary_sorc_126.desc: Taking direct damage has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to reset the Cooldown of one of your {c_important}Defensive{/c} Skills.
legendary_sorc_126.name: of the Unwavering

legendary_sorc_127.desc: {c_important}Core{/c} or {c_important}Mastery{/c} Skills cast at or above {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Mana gain a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%+|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Chance.
legendary_sorc_127.name: Elementalist's

legendary_sorc_128.desc: Your Mana Regeneration is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} if you have not taken damage in the last {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_sorc_128.name: of Concentration

legendary_sorc_129.desc: You deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} more damage to Immobilized, Stunned, or {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c} enemies.
legendary_sorc_129.name: of Control

legendary_sorc_131.desc: You take {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} less damage from Crowd Controlled or {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} enemies.
legendary_sorc_131.name: Everliving

legendary_sorc_132.desc: Casting a {c_important}Basic{/c} Skill reduces the Mana cost of your next {c_important}Core{/c} Skill by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}.
legendary_sorc_132.name: of Efficiency

Paragon_Sorc_Legendary_001.desc: Your Burning damage is increased by {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%|]{/c} of your Critical Strike Damage, further increased by {c_number}[{SF_1} * 100|%|]{/c} for every {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} Intelligence you have. (Current Bonus: {c_number}[{SF_6} * 100|%|]{/c})

Paragon_Sorc_Legendary_002.desc: Casting {c_important}Fireball{/c} or {c_important}Meteor{/c} increases the Critical Strike Chance of further casts of that Skill by {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%+|]{/c} for {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds, up to {c_number}[{SF_0} * {SF_1} * 100|%+|]{/c}. Additional stacks do not refresh this timer.

Paragon_Sorc_Legendary_003.desc: Burning enemies you kill explode, dealing {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} of their Maximum Life to surrounding enemies.

Paragon_Sorc_Legendary_004.desc: Your Elemental attacks deal {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Damage against {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c} enemies.

Paragon_Sorc_Legendary_005.desc: Dealing Cold Damage to {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} enemies increases your Lucky Hit Chance by {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%+|]{/c} for {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} seconds, up to {c_number}[{SF_0} * {SF_2} * 100|%+|]{/c}.

Paragon_Sorc_Legendary_006.desc: Killing a {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c} enemy grants you {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life as a {c_important}{u}Barrier{/u}{/c} {c_number}({shield:BARRIER}){/c} for {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Sorc_Legendary_008.desc: {c_important}{u}Crackling Energy{/u}{/c} has a {c_number}[{SF_0}|%|]{/c} chance to not consume a Charge when triggered. {c_important}{u}Crackling Energy's{/u}{/c} damage is increased by {c_number}[{SF_3} * 100|x%|]{/c} per {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} total Intelligence you have. (Current Bonus: {c_number}[{SF_4} * 100|x%|])

Paragon_Sorc_Legendary_009.desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Your {c_important}Shock{/c} skills have a {c_number}{SF_0}%{/c} chance to release {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} lightning sparks that each deal {c_number}{payload:SPARK}{/c} damage.

Paragon_Sorc_Legendary_010.desc: You deal {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage to enemies that are both Burning and {c_important}{u}Chilled{/u}{/c}.

Paragon_Sorc_Legendary_011.desc: Your {c_important}Conjuration{/c} Skills have a {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%|]{/c} reduced Cooldown or Mana cost per {c_important}Conjuration{/c} Skill you have equipped.

Paragon_Sorc_Legendary_012.desc: After using an Elemental skill, you gain {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} Resistance against that element for {c_number}4{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Sorc_Legendary_013.desc: Nearby enemies take {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c} increased Elemental damage. You and Nearby allies gain {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} to all Resistances.

Paragon_Sorc_Legendary_014.desc: While moving, you regenerate Mana {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c} faster. While standing still, you gain {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%x|]{/c} increased Fire, Cold, and Lightning damage every second, up to {c_number}[{SF_1}*{SF_2}*100|%x|]{/c}.

Paragon_Sorc_Legendary_016.desc: While you have a {c_important}{u}Barrier{/u}{/c}, you take {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} less damage and gain {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%+|]{/c} increased Movement Speed.

{c_important}Frost Bolt{/c} makes {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c} enemies {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_9}{/c} seconds.
{c_important}Frost Nova{/c} makes enemies {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_8}{/c} seconds, increased to {c_number}{SF_9}{/c} seconds against Bosses.
{c_important}Frozen Orb's{/c} explosion restores {c_number}{SF_23}{/c} Mana when hitting a {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c} enemy.
{c_important}Hydra{/c} also Burns enemies for an additional {c_number}[{SF_11}*100|%|]{/c} of its Base damage dealt over {c_number}{buffduration:MOD_BURN}{/c} seconds.
Damage against {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} enemies contributes {c_number}[{SF_9} * 100|%|]{/c} more to {c_important}Ice Armor's{/c} {c_important}{u}Barrier{/u}{/c}.
{c_number}[{SF_10} * 100|%|]{/c} of {c_important}Enhanced Ice Blades's{/c} Cooldown reduction is applied to your other Skills.
Hitting an enemy with {c_number}{SF_16}{/c} {c_important}Ice Shards{/c} in a single cast makes them {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_17}{/c} seconds.
Enemies deal {c_number}[{SF_28} * 100|%|]{/c} less damage while Burning from {c_important}Incinerate{/c}.
Each time {c_important}Spark{/c} hits an enemy it has a {c_number}[{SF_14} * 100|%|]{/c} chance to form a {c_important}{u}Crackling Energy{/u}{/c}.

Collecting {c_important}{u}Crackling Energy{/u}{/c} increases the damage of your next {c_important}Lightning Spear{/c} cast by {c_number}[{SF_9} * 100|%x|]{/c}, up to {c_number}[{SF_9} * {SF_13} * 100|%x|]{/c}.
{c_important}Meteor{/c} falls {c_number}[{SF_17}*100|%|]{/c} faster.
For {c_number}{buffduration:UPGRADEA_CRACKLING_ENERGY}{/c} seconds after {c_important}Teleporting{/c}, {c_important}{u}Crackling Energy{/u}{/c} hits {c_number}{SF_25}{/c} additional enemies.
After {c_important}Teleporting{/c}, you gain {c_number}[{SF_12}*100|%|]{/c} Damage Reduction for {c_number}{SF_13}{/c} seconds.
{c_important}Meteor's{/c} impact Immobilizes enemies for {c_number}{buffduration:IMMOBILIZE}{/c} seconds.
{c_important}Lightning Spear{/c} Stuns enemies for {c_number}{buffduration:UPGRADEB_STUN}{/c} seconds when Critically Striking.
{c_important}Spark{/c} grants {c_number}[{SF_15}*100|%+|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Chance per cast for {c_number}{SF_16}{/c} seconds, up to {c_number}[{SF_17}*100|%+|]{/c}.
{c_important}Fireball{/c} deals {c_number}[{SF_23} * 100|%|]{/c} of the Burning damage you've applied to enemies as additional direct damage.
Every {c_number}{SF_17}{/c} seconds an enemy has been hit by {c_important}Incinerate{/c}, they are Immobilized for {c_number}{SF_18}{/c} |4second.:seconds.
While you have a {c_important}{u}Barrier{/u}{/c} active, casts of {c_important}Ice Shards{/c} treat enemies as if they were {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c}.
Your {c_important}Ice Blades{/c} gain {c_number}[{SF_13} * 100|%+|]{/c} increased Attack Speed per active {c_important}Ice Blades{/c}.
Enemies that hit you while {c_important}Ice Armor{/c} is active have a {c_number}[{SF_12}*100|%|]{/c} chance to become {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{buffduration:FREEZE}{/c} seconds.
After you Critically Strike, your {c_important}Hydras{/c} gain {c_number}[{SF_13}*100|%+|]{/c} Critical Strike Chance for {c_number}{buffduration:MOD_CRIT_CHANCE_BONUS}{/c} seconds.

{c_important}Frozen Orb's{/c} explosion has a {c_number}[{SF_31} * 100|%|]{/c} chance to make all enemies hit {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_32}{/c} seconds. {c_important}Frozen Orb{/c} always makes {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c} enemies {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c}.
{c_important}Frost Nova{/c} generates {c_number}{SF_10}{/c} Mana per enemy hit.
{c_important}Frost Bolt{/c} generates {c_number}{SF_10}{/c} Mana when hitting {c_important}{u}Chilled{/u}{/c} or {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c} enemies.
{c_important}Flame Shield{/c} Heals you for {c_number}[{SF_12} * 100|%|]{/c} of your missing Life.
You gain {c_number}[{SF_16}*100|%x|]{/c} increased Mana Regeneration per active {c_important}Firewall{/c}, up to {c_number}[{SF_16} * {SF_17} * 100|%x|]{/c}.
Critical Strikes with {c_important}Fire Bolt{/c} increase the Burning damage you deal to the enemy by {c_number}[{SF_11} * 100|%x|]{/c} for {c_number}{buffduration:UPGRADEB_CRIT_DAMAGE}{/c} seconds.
{c_important}Charged Bolts{/c} deals {c_number}[{SF_27}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage to Stunned enemies.
If {c_important}Chain Lightning{/c} bounces off of you, its next hit deals {c_number}[{SF_13} * 100|%x|]{/c} increased damage.

1HWand_Unique_Sorc_100.desc: While Channeling {c_important}Incinerate{/c}, you periodically shoot embers that are attracted to enemies, each dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Fire damage.
1HWand_Unique_Sorc_100.flavor: The burn may heal, but the pain is eternal.
1HWand_Unique_Sorc_100.name: Flamescar

2HStaff_Unique_Sorc_002.desc: Every {c_number}3rd{/c} cast of {c_important}Fireball{/c_important} launches {c_number}2{/c} additional projectiles.
2HStaff_Unique_Sorc_002.flavor:
"Leaving even blackened bones for your kin to mourn is too good an end for you." 
- Josiah
2HStaff_Unique_Sorc_002.name: Staff of Endless Rage

2HStaff_Unique_Sorc_100.desc: {c_important}Charged Bolts{/c} pierce, but deal {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} less damage.
2HStaff_Unique_Sorc_100.flavor:
"Also known as the Greatstaff of the Old Religion, this powerful relic is one of only a small handful of Skatsimi artifacts that have survived to this day."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
2HStaff_Unique_Sorc_100.name: Staff of Lam Esen

Amulet_Unique_Sorc_100.desc: Upon collecting {c_important}{u}Crackling Energy{/u}{/c}, there's a  {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} chance to release a lightning nova, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Lightning Damage.
Amulet_Unique_Sorc_100.flavor: The only thing more potent than Esadora's magic was her endless hatred of humanity. As she lay dying, the pale amulet around her neck drank in both.
Amulet_Unique_Sorc_100.name: Esadora's Overflowing Cameo

Boots_Unique_Sorc_100.desc: Your Critical Strike Chance is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of your Movement Speed bonus.
Boots_Unique_Sorc_100.flavor:
"While scholars have proven these boots were not created by Esu herself, it is noteworthy that they have been passed down since the formation of the Mage Clans."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Boots_Unique_Sorc_100.name: Esu's Heirloom

Chest_Unique_Sorc_002.desc: After using {c_important}Teleport{/c}, Close enemies are Pulled to you and Stunned for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds, but {c_important}Teleport's{/c} Cooldown is increased by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%x|]{/c}.
Chest_Unique_Sorc_002.flavor: The power you have is never enough.
Chest_Unique_Sorc_002.name: Raiment of the Infinite

Gloves_Unique_Sorc_002.desc: {c_important}Fireball{/c_important} now bounces as it travels, exploding each time it hits the ground, but its explosion deals {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} less damage.
Gloves_Unique_Sorc_002.flavor: After Inarius returned to Sanctuary, he sought a way back to the High Heavens. His first step was to reignite the religion he had abandoned millennia before: the Cathedral of Light.
Gloves_Unique_Sorc_002.name: Gloves of the Illuminator

Pants_Unique_Sorc_100.desc: Enemies that die while {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c} have a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to unleash a {c_important}Frost Nova{/c}.
Pants_Unique_Sorc_100.flavor: The mad artisan saw his fingers turn black from frostbite as he worked the cloth, but refused to stay the needle and thread for even a moment.
Pants_Unique_Sorc_100.name: Iceheart Brais
